mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: This is a crucial moment for the Specialist's research: what you do now will decide everything, in both the short-term, and the long-term. Will you be able to save the Laboratory?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Hell! That's perfect! You saved the Laboratory equipment and the research! Bought me the time I need to look into their servers and finish off what I can. Come see me later, dodger- I've still got some work for you.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, this is getting bad- they've caught onto us. They're planning on sending mercs to stop us in our tracks by having them go scorched earth on the Laboratory- documents, servers, the whole nine yards. You've got to go in there and make sure they don't get the chance. Get moving, dodger!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: You’ve managed to prevent the mercenaries from recovering and destroying TerraGroup intel and equipment so you won’t be hearing about them for a while. They’re going to have to prepare, but so are you. Give yourself a breather, and prepare for the worst. You’re going to have to reenergize yourself for the upcoming fights. You’re ready? That’s good. Now, the folks at TerraGroup have been preparing very specific stocks...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, this will prevent them from finding the crates and utilizing them! It might save us some trouble down the line. Now, I still have a job for you, so come see me whenever you have the time!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So my boy, I managed to get some information about stocks of experimental drugs hidden in a cache at the mall. Apparently, they were planning to test the drugs on the local population. Intel states that it’s located in some sort of armory, with some MS2000 Markers in the crates so they can be transported. I need you to find out where the crates are located, remove the markers, and report back to me!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: It's starting to get interesting. New syringes have started to crop up containing unknown stimulants, with positive effects that seem promising. It might be enough for TerraGroup to stay afloat- maybe there'll be a time where they'll have more weaponry prototypes, too?
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Thanks for finding me these weapon parts, dodger. Go ahead and assemble the rifle and hand it over- I'll modify it according to plan. In the meantime, there are some files from TerraGroups to... pan over.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Good work, dodger- listen to me, carefully. I need you to bring me a particular weapon- a Colt M4A1 with a 20inch barrel, a Colt buffer tube and a Colt charging handle, a High Standard M4SS Stock, a tan PMAG M3 30 FDE magazine, a colt A2 pistol grip, a URX 3.1 10,75inch handguard, a low-profile MK12 gas block, and that it all comes from the Laboratory. It'd be great if all of it came from there- then I'd be certain it's all compatible with what I want to do. Get moving, buddy!
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: I heard that some encrypted data from TerraGroup had been stolen by a certain someone hiding out with his buddies in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base. I bet there's some good information on it that could be sold for the right price, but... I won't bore you with the details. Get to work, killer.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: I was able to decrypt part of that encrypted data you found on Gluhar. It mentions a former USEC operator working under TerraGroup who's looking for a reliable pair of hands. Considering you're confident, you should take a look at it- apparently, his hideout isn't far from the entrance of some hidden-away laboratory. He might have some valuable equipment lying around.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, listen up, killer. Gluhar and his lackeys are well-armed and well-prepared- and they're expecting trouble. They're over in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base, and tend to patrol around the barracks. You need to put them down and find an encrypted drive on one of them. Kill them, and bring me that damn encrypted drive!
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you'd get out of there unscathed? Well, you can dream, but... it seems like he wants to send you to the grave with this one. Don't believe that it's without risk- everything you do, touch, or breathe on this job will have an impact on your body. Take care, and above all else, take... adequate precautions.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! I didn't believe for a second that you'd make it there, let alone make it back. You wore the mask from start to finish, didn't you? Hand it over, so I can get it properly contained and start taking a look at it- and come see me, when you have time. I've still got work for you.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Perfect, you're back! See, those eggheads down in TerraGroup's laboratories were working on some sort of new material. Their database is too large and too well-protected for me to learn anything about it in the short term, so... you've got some leg-work to do. Find yourself a gas mask, and get moving. Don't take the mask off until the stuff's left your hands.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Expect the unexpected. It's time to take one small leap into the secrets of TerraGroup- there's still a lot to discover, at all. Don't hesitate, and prepare yourself to undergo significant pressure, exertion and stress. Your life and livelihood is at stake.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Ready, dodger? Perfect, because that's the end of your fun. I've prepared something for you- try to make good use of it?
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey, dodger. Finished something for you- go ahead and take it. I don't have a job for you yet, so take advantage of your new-found freetime and prepare yourself. I've made some interesting discoveries, so come back soon and I might be able to tell you what to do.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Despite how hard it was to decrypt the data, Fence's contacts made short work of it. Thanks to them, you've gotten into contact with that ex-USEC operator- but, now he wants you to prove your worth to him. You're going to need to get your hands dirty.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: There you are again! I'm surprised you pulled that off- at least you don't seem like you'll get yourself killed by a bunch of flies. I still need you, so hold on a second: this is important. I have a few more... missions, if you'll take them: and don't worry, I have a good reward in mind.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, dodger, it was you who managed to decrypt my drive? Interesting! You look like too much of a bruiser to have pulled that off without some help- so, you're going to show me that you've got some wits. You know what's hidden away not too far from here- so, you're going to go in there, and fight your way out. Three times. Get the lead out, we don't have all day!
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Now that you've got your hands on your new rifle, you need to find a way to obtain its ammunition. If it was tested in-house by TerraGroup, then maybe there's some in the Laboratory? The Specialist seems to believe it.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! You really found them? Well played! Knew I could count on you- so, listen: I'm going to give you a few for the moment, but not much. Come back later, and I should be able to make more.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Listen, if you want me to make rounds for your new toy, you're going to have to do some legwork. Go down into the Laboratory and find the rounds they were using with the prototype rifle. I don't know where they were stored, so I can't really tell you much more- but try to be logical in your searching, alright?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Finally, things are getting serious. The Specialist is putting the finishing touches on a prototype AR-pattern rifle that was meant to be manufactured by TerraGroup and tested in this self-same Laboratory, but... you still lack the most important part: ammunition. Try not to misplace the rifle, would you?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: And... here! The job's done. I've reassembled the prototype- an M4A1 converted to 6.5x39mm Grendel in-house, but... we don't have the ammunition. Try not to lose it! I don't have what it takes to assemble another right now.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Pass the rifle over, and I can sort out the conversion.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you were quiet the last time you prevented the TerraGroup raid on the Lab. Turns out, you’re wrong. This is only the beginning of a bitter struggle to keep you from getting your hands on confidential Lab intel, and you angered them.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Great, they managed to seize some of the equipment and you didn’t stop them. We just lost some valuable information and assets from TerraGroup that we could have utilized. You’re a damn bother to me!
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, you’ve done a good job again. Here, I managed to get my hands on some prototype armor the scientists were working on while I was still employed under TerraGroup. Take good care of it, it’s the only one I have in stock...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey boy! Listen here, we have a problem on our hands. I just saw a large group of mercenaries enter the Lab. I think they’re back once again to either destroy TerraGroup property or take it for themselves to prevent us from getting our hands on it. Appropriate. Here, take this gear and go defend the Lab. Kill all the mercenaries there before they can leave with any goods, and hurry the hell up! Ah, wait a minute… there’s word that they’re also planning to test some sort of dangerous new gas, so better you be wearing a gas mask as a precaution, lest you end up dead from the gas.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: You've proven your worth to him, but this is only the beginning. It's time to give it your all- did you really think that TerraGroups abandoned their lab outright? Well... you're wrong.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Congratulations! Those jammers were doing some nasty work, but thanks to your efforts, I've got the wiggle-room I needed to get into and around TerraGroup's systems. Together, we can make a hell of a profit- and I'll be able to prepare for you some stuff that was intended for some of their Special Forces contractors. They should allow you to get a leg up on others looking to unearth the secrets of TerraGroup.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, buddy, you're back- ready for a mission? Perfect. It turns out that I could get external access to TerraGroup's servers, but those spooks managed to lock them down tight with jammers. You're going to go in there and get rid of them- so bring a good kit with you and pack a lunch: you're gonna' need it. I should be able to use those jammers for other things, if you bring them back, to get started.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: It's time to put your talents to the test. Will you be able to repel them and survive? Or will you succumb and suffer the consequences?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Good, you made it through. Nice gun you picked up, they're well-equipped.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Now listen to me. Mercenaries have been shot by scavs in the woods. There must be equipment left where they died, find them and retrieve that equipment. Be careful, Terragroup soldiers are most likely looking for them, so be careful, they're not kidding. Don't hesitate to use the weapon you might find!

conditions.eightQuest_tgs_Req1: Eliminate 15 Raiders in the Laboratory with the P-M4A1 assault rifle in a single raid
conditions.eightQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Survive and extract from the Laboratory

conditions.eleventhQuest_tgs_FindItem: Find the crate and collect the marker at the Interchange
conditions.eleventhQuest_tgs_Handover: Hand over the marker from the crate

conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir1: Find in raid M4A1 Assault Rifle
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir2: Find in raid Colt A2 grip
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Find in raid PMAG GEN M3 30 FDE
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir4: Find in raid Upper receiver Colt M4A1
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir5: Find in raid Colt buffer tube
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir6: Find in raid Colt AR-15 charging handle for AR-15
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir9: Find in raid AR-15 Carry Handle
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir10: Find in raid High Standard M4SS Stock
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir11: Find in raid MK12 Low Profile Gas Block
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir12: Survive and extract from the Laboratory

conditions.firstQuest_tgs_FirstRequir2: Find and eliminate an assault guard
conditions.firstQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Find and eliminate a scout guard
conditions.firstQuest_tgs_FirstRequir4: Find and eliminate a security guard

conditions.fourthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Survive and leave the area while wearing a GP-5 gasmask

conditions.ninthQuest_tgs_Condition: Level up the Stress Resistance skill to 30

conditions.secondQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Survive and extract from 3 raids in the Laboratory

conditions.seventhQuest_tgs_Handover: Hand over the ammo prototype to The Specialist
conditions.seventhQuest_tgs_seventhRequir1: Survive and extract from the Laboratory

conditions.tenthQuest_tgs_Req1: Kill 30 raiders in the Lab. You must be wearing a GP-5 gasmask
conditions.tenthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Survive in the Lab for at least 10 minutes and extract
conditions.tenthQuest_tgs_FailCounter: Do not die or extract under 10 minutes in the Lab

conditions.thirdQuest_tgs_FirstRequir1: Remove the electronics jammers from the servers
conditions.thirdQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Survive and extract from the Laboratory

conditions.twelfthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Find the dead raider GPS device.
conditions.twelfthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Kill 30 raiders in Woods with the dead raider equipment.

tgs_338_badnews.Name: "Bad News" .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews.Description: The “Bad News” in .338 Lapua has become a signature rifle for Noreen Firearms. The rifle was originally designed with the intent of taking a well-known large caliber, and being able to send it downrange accurately, further than any other semi-automatic rifle on the market. Now, with the Bad News Gen. II, we’ve taken a rifle that was already a long-distance powerhouse, and completely upgraded it. With new upgraded receivers, a new gas block, and a mean looking hand-guard, the new Bad News takes everything you loved from the first gen, and made it even better. We took a “signature rifle”, and turned it into a masterpiece.

tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Name: "Bad News" Receiver
tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Description: A receiver specially made for "Bad News" rifle in .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum Cartridge
tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire rifle cartridge. It was developed during the 1980s as a high-powered, long-range cartridge for military snipers. It was used in the War in Afghanistan and the Iraq War. As a result of this, it became more widely available. In addition to its military role, it is increasingly used by hunters and civilian long-range shooting enthusiasts. The .338 Lapua Magnum is capable of taking down any game animal, though its suitability for some dangerous game (Cape buffalo, hippopotamus, white rhinoceros, and elephant) is arguable, unless accompanied by a larger "backup" calibre: "There is a huge difference between calibres that will kill an elephant and those that can be relied upon to stop one."

tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Name: 10 Rounds mag .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Description: A 10round magazine specially made for the rifle "Bad News" with .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Name: 6,5x39mm GRENDEL bullet prototype
tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Description: This is a bullet prototype of 6.5x39mm GRENDEL ammo. They are made by the terragroup laboratory.

tgs_armor_prototype.Name: A prototype of a plate carrier vest LBT 6094A
tgs_armor_prototype.Description: A simple and minimalist vest plate holder that can be equipped with a vest. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and given as equipment to the terragroup special forces.

tgs_beacon.Name: MS2000 Marker
tgs_beacon.Description: The marker is used during nighttime operations. It emits signal in the IR region which are visible through NVGs. Uses special filter when operating in the IR mode, if the filter is removed, it appears as a bright flash in the visible spectrum. In the extended mode operates with a blue flash.

tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Name: Blaze Dogtags
tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Description: This is the dogtag of the soldier Blaze, who is working for Terragroup Labs. This is a high valuable item that can be used as a proof that you killed the soldier. Blaze was well known in the mercenaries as very experienced and smart. Maybe not smart enough for you.

tgs_chemical.Name: Chemical container
tgs_chemical.Description: Hermetic container for storing various chemicals. Do not open this container for any reasons.

tgs_chemical_meds.Name: Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_chemical_meds2.Name: Experimental Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds2.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_genm3_fde.Name: PMAG GEN M3 26 6.5x39 GRENDEL 26-round magazine prototype
tgs_genm3_fde.Description: A 26-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 26 magazine prototype, for 6.5x39 ammunition designed to be used with the P-M4A1.

tgs_grendel_intelligence.Name: Crafting plans for GRENDEL cardrige
tgs_grendel_intelligence.Description: Some crafting plans made by The Specialist for crafting 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cardriges.

tgs_jammer.Name: Electronic jammer
tgs_jammer.Description: Assembled electronic jammer. Emetting electric waves into the connected network for creating huge dysfunction in the system.

tgs_manager_keycard.Name: Lab. Carte magnétique du manager
tgs_manager_keycard.Description: Une carte magnétique provenant du manager du laboratoire. Elle permet d'ouvrir tous les accès à carte magnétique du site.

tgs_powerArmor.Name: Armor vest prototype Redut
tgs_powerArmor.Description: A powered and resistant prototype armor, it offers excellent protection against bullets. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and donated as equipment to the terragroup special forces

tgs_prototype_m16.Name: Assault rifle prototype Colt M4A1 6.5x39mm
tgs_prototype_m16.Description: A prototype of the Colt M4A1 - an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Name: Colt buffer tube
tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Name: Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for Prototype M4A1 assault rifle
tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Description: Upper receiver for M4A1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

tgs_ssdDrive.Name: Crypted SSD
tgs_ssdDrive.Description: Solid State Drive (SSD). Used for data storage with a better read and reading speed. He seems to be crypted and no one seems to know how to access to his datas.

tgs_tgBeacon.Name: Terragroup GPS
tgs_tgBeacon.Description: This GPS device is used to locate Terragroup assault members positions. It isn't as precise as an advanced GPS device for avoiding hacking and members positions leaking.

tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Name: URX 3.1 10.75" handguard for AR15
tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Description: Knights Armament URX 3.1 handguard for AR-15 equipped with a unique interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: A guard from TerraGroup who's been set up at the Laboratory. He knows a lot about the goings-on of that place, but in turn, not many people have any information on him, or knows who he is.

mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey boy! Listen here, we have a problem on our hands. I just saw a large group of mercenaries enter the Lab. I think they’re back once again to either destroy TerraGroup property or take it for themselves to prevent us from getting our hands on it. Appropriate. Here, take this gear and go defend the Lab. Kill all the mercenaries there before they can leave with any goods, and hurry the hell up! Ah, wait a minute… there’s word that they’re also planning to test some sort of dangerous new gas, so better you be wearing a gas mask as a precaution, lest you end up dead from the gas.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: You've proven your worth to him, but this is only the beginning. It's time to give it your all- did you really think that TerraGroups abandoned their lab outright? Well... you're wrong.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Congratulations! Those jammers were doing some nasty work, but thanks to your efforts, I've got the wiggle-room I needed to get into and around TerraGroup's systems. Together, we can make a hell of a profit- and I'll be able to prepare for you some stuff that was intended for some of their Special Forces contractors. They should allow you to get a leg up on others looking to unearth the secrets of TerraGroup.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, buddy, you're back- ready for a mission? Perfect. It turns out that I could get external access to TerraGroup's servers, but those spooks managed to lock them down tight with jammers. You're going to go in there and get rid of them- so bring a good kit with you and pack a lunch: you're gonna' need it. I should be able to use those jammers for other things, if you bring them back, to get started.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: It's time to put your talents to the test. Will you be able to repel them and survive? Or will you succumb and suffer the consequences?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Good, you made it through. Nice gun you picked up, they're well-equipped.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Now listen to me. Mercenaries have been shot by scavs in the woods. There must be equipment left where they died, find them and retrieve that equipment. Be careful, Terragroup soldiers are most likely looking for them, so be careful, they're not kidding. Don't hesitate to use the weapon you might find!

tgs_338_badnews.Name: "Bad News" .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews.Description: The “Bad News” in .338 Lapua has become a signature rifle for Noreen Firearms. The rifle was originally designed with the intent of taking a well-known large caliber, and being able to send it downrange accurately, further than any other semi-automatic rifle on the market. Now, with the Bad News Gen. II, we’ve taken a rifle that was already a long-distance powerhouse, and completely upgraded it. With new upgraded receivers, a new gas block, and a mean looking hand-guard, the new Bad News takes everything you loved from the first gen, and made it even better. We took a “signature rifle”, and turned it into a masterpiece.

tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Name: "Bad News" Receiver
tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Description: A receiver specially made for "Bad News" rifle in .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum Cartridge
tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire rifle cartridge. It was developed during the 1980s as a high-powered, long-range cartridge for military snipers. It was used in the War in Afghanistan and the Iraq War. As a result of this, it became more widely available. In addition to its military role, it is increasingly used by hunters and civilian long-range shooting enthusiasts. The .338 Lapua Magnum is capable of taking down any game animal, though its suitability for some dangerous game (Cape buffalo, hippopotamus, white rhinoceros, and elephant) is arguable, unless accompanied by a larger "backup" calibre: "There is a huge difference between calibres that will kill an elephant and those that can be relied upon to stop one."

tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Name: 10 Rounds mag .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Description: A 10round magazine specially made for the rifle "Bad News" with .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Name: 6,5x39mm GRENDEL bullet prototype
tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Description: This is a bullet prototype of 6.5x39mm GRENDEL ammo. They are made by the terragroup laboratory.

tgs_armor_prototype.Name: A prototype of a plate carrier vest LBT 6094A
tgs_armor_prototype.Description: A simple and minimalist vest plate holder that can be equipped with a vest. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and given as equipment to the terragroup special forces.

tgs_beacon.Name: MS2000 Marker
tgs_beacon.Description: The marker is used during nighttime operations. It emits signal in the IR region which are visible through NVGs. Uses special filter when operating in the IR mode, if the filter is removed, it appears as a bright flash in the visible spectrum. In the extended mode operates with a blue flash.

tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Name: Blaze Dogtags
tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Description: This is the dogtag of the soldier Blaze, who is working for Terragroup Labs. This is a high valuable item that can be used as a proof that you killed the soldier. Blaze was well known in the mercenaries as very experienced and smart. Maybe not smart enough for you.

tgs_chemical.Name: Chemical container
tgs_chemical.Description: Hermetic container for storing various chemicals. Do not open this container for any reasons.

tgs_chemical_meds.Name: Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_chemical_meds2.Name: Experimental Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds2.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_genm3_fde.Name: PMAG GEN M3 26 6.5x39 GRENDEL 26-round magazine prototype
tgs_genm3_fde.Description: A 26-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 26 magazine prototype, for 6.5x39 ammunition designed to be used with the P-M4A1.

tgs_grendel_intelligence.Name: Crafting plans for GRENDEL cardrige
tgs_grendel_intelligence.Description: Some crafting plans made by The Specialist for crafting 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cardriges.

tgs_jammer.Name: Electronic jammer
tgs_jammer.Description: Assembled electronic jammer. Emetting electric waves into the connected network for creating huge dysfunction in the system.

tgs_manager_keycard.Name: Lab. Carte magnétique du manager
tgs_manager_keycard.Description: Une carte magnétique provenant du manager du laboratoire. Elle permet d'ouvrir tous les accès à carte magnétique du site.

tgs_powerArmor.Name: Armor vest prototype Redut
tgs_powerArmor.Description: A powered and resistant prototype armor, it offers excellent protection against bullets. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and donated as equipment to the terragroup special forces

tgs_prototype_m16.Name: Assault rifle prototype Colt M4A1 6.5x39mm
tgs_prototype_m16.Description: A prototype of the Colt M4A1 - an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Name: Colt buffer tube
tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Name: Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for Prototype M4A1 assault rifle
tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Description: Upper receiver for M4A1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

tgs_ssdDrive.Name: Crypted SSD
tgs_ssdDrive.Description: Solid State Drive (SSD). Used for data storage with a better read and reading speed. He seems to be crypted and no one seems to know how to access to his datas.

tgs_tgBeacon.Name: Terragroup GPS
tgs_tgBeacon.Description: This GPS device is used to locate Terragroup assault members positions. It isn't as precise as an advanced GPS device for avoiding hacking and members positions leaking.

tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Name: URX 3.1 10.75" handguard for AR15
tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Description: Knights Armament URX 3.1 handguard for AR-15 equipped with a unique interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: A guard from TerraGroup who's been set up at the Laboratory. He knows a lot about the goings-on of that place, but in turn, not many people have any information on him, or knows who he is.

mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: This is a crucial moment for the Specialist's research: what you do now will decide everything, in both the short-term, and the long-term. Will you be able to save the Laboratory?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Hell! That's perfect! You saved the Laboratory equipment and the research! Bought me the time I need to look into their servers and finish off what I can. Come see me later, dodger- I've still got some work for you.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, this is getting bad- they've caught onto us. They're planning on sending mercs to stop us in our tracks by having them go scorched earth on the Laboratory- documents, servers, the whole nine yards. You've got to go in there and make sure they don't get the chance. Get moving, dodger!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: You’ve managed to prevent the mercenaries from recovering and destroying TerraGroup intel and equipment so you won’t be hearing about them for a while. They’re going to have to prepare, but so are you. Give yourself a breather, and prepare for the worst. You’re going to have to reenergize yourself for the upcoming fights. You’re ready? That’s good. Now, the folks at TerraGroup have been preparing very specific stocks...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, this will prevent them from finding the crates and utilizing them! It might save us some trouble down the line. Now, I still have a job for you, so come see me whenever you have the time!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So my boy, I managed to get some information about stocks of experimental drugs hidden in a cache at the mall. Apparently, they were planning to test the drugs on the local population. Intel states that it’s located in some sort of armory, with some MS2000 Markers in the crates so they can be transported. I need you to find out where the crates are located, remove the markers, and report back to me!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: It's starting to get interesting. New syringes have started to crop up containing unknown stimulants, with positive effects that seem promising. It might be enough for TerraGroup to stay afloat- maybe there'll be a time where they'll have more weaponry prototypes, too?
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Thanks for finding me these weapon parts, dodger. Go ahead and assemble the rifle and hand it over- I'll modify it according to plan. In the meantime, there are some files from TerraGroups to... pan over.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Good work, dodger- listen to me, carefully. I need you to bring me a particular weapon- a Colt M4A1 with a 20inch barrel, a Colt buffer tube and a Colt charging handle, a High Standard M4SS Stock, a tan PMAG M3 30 FDE magazine, a colt A2 pistol grip, a URX 3.1 10,75inch handguard, a low-profile MK12 gas block, and that it all comes from the Laboratory. It'd be great if all of it came from there- then I'd be certain it's all compatible with what I want to do. Get moving, buddy!
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: I heard that some encrypted data from TerraGroup had been stolen by a certain someone hiding out with his buddies in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base. I bet there's some good information on it that could be sold for the right price, but... I won't bore you with the details. Get to work, killer.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: I was able to decrypt part of that encrypted data you found on Gluhar. It mentions a former USEC operator working under TerraGroup who's looking for a reliable pair of hands. Considering you're confident, you should take a look at it- apparently, his hideout isn't far from the entrance of some hidden-away laboratory. He might have some valuable equipment lying around.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, listen up, killer. Gluhar and his lackeys are well-armed and well-prepared- and they're expecting trouble. They're over in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base, and tend to patrol around the barracks. You need to put them down and find an encrypted drive on one of them. Kill them, and bring me that damn encrypted drive!
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you'd get out of there unscathed? Well, you can dream, but... it seems like he wants to send you to the grave with this one. Don't believe that it's without risk- everything you do, touch, or breathe on this job will have an impact on your body. Take care, and above all else, take... adequate precautions.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! I didn't believe for a second that you'd make it there, let alone make it back. You wore the mask from start to finish, didn't you? Hand it over, so I can get it properly contained and start taking a look at it- and come see me, when you have time. I've still got work for you.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Perfect, you're back! See, those eggheads down in TerraGroup's laboratories were working on some sort of new material. Their database is too large and too well-protected for me to learn anything about it in the short term, so... you've got some leg-work to do. Find yourself a gas mask, and get moving. Don't take the mask off until the stuff's left your hands.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Expect the unexpected. It's time to take one small leap into the secrets of TerraGroup- there's still a lot to discover, at all. Don't hesitate, and prepare yourself to undergo significant pressure, exertion and stress. Your life and livelihood is at stake.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Ready, dodger? Perfect, because that's the end of your fun. I've prepared something for you- try to make good use of it?
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey, dodger. Finished something for you- go ahead and take it. I don't have a job for you yet, so take advantage of your new-found freetime and prepare yourself. I've made some interesting discoveries, so come back soon and I might be able to tell you what to do.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Despite how hard it was to decrypt the data, Fence's contacts made short work of it. Thanks to them, you've gotten into contact with that ex-USEC operator- but, now he wants you to prove your worth to him. You're going to need to get your hands dirty.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: There you are again! I'm surprised you pulled that off- at least you don't seem like you'll get yourself killed by a bunch of flies. I still need you, so hold on a second: this is important. I have a few more... missions, if you'll take them: and don't worry, I have a good reward in mind.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, dodger, it was you who managed to decrypt my drive? Interesting! You look like too much of a bruiser to have pulled that off without some help- so, you're going to show me that you've got some wits. You know what's hidden away not too far from here- so, you're going to go in there, and fight your way out. Three times. Get the lead out, we don't have all day!
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Now that you've got your hands on your new rifle, you need to find a way to obtain its ammunition. If it was tested in-house by TerraGroup, then maybe there's some in the Laboratory? The Specialist seems to believe it.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! You really found them? Well played! Knew I could count on you- so, listen: I'm going to give you a few for the moment, but not much. Come back later, and I should be able to make more.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Listen, if you want me to make rounds for your new toy, you're going to have to do some legwork. Go down into the Laboratory and find the rounds they were using with the prototype rifle. I don't know where they were stored, so I can't really tell you much more- but try to be logical in your searching, alright?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Finally, things are getting serious. The Specialist is putting the finishing touches on a prototype AR-pattern rifle that was meant to be manufactured by TerraGroup and tested in this self-same Laboratory, but... you still lack the most important part: ammunition. Try not to misplace the rifle, would you?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: And... here! The job's done. I've reassembled the prototype- an M4A1 converted to 6.5x39mm Grendel in-house, but... we don't have the ammunition. Try not to lose it! I don't have what it takes to assemble another right now.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Pass the rifle over, and I can sort out the conversion.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you were quiet the last time you prevented the TerraGroup raid on the Lab. Turns out, you’re wrong. This is only the beginning of a bitter struggle to keep you from getting your hands on confidential Lab intel, and you angered them.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Great, they managed to seize some of the equipment and you didn’t stop them. We just lost some valuable information and assets from TerraGroup that we could have utilized. You’re a damn bother to me!
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, you’ve done a good job again. Here, I managed to get my hands on some prototype armor the scientists were working on while I was still employed under TerraGroup. Take good care of it, it’s the only one I have in stock...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey boy! Listen here, we have a problem on our hands. I just saw a large group of mercenaries enter the Lab. I think they’re back once again to either destroy TerraGroup property or take it for themselves to prevent us from getting our hands on it. Appropriate. Here, take this gear and go defend the Lab. Kill all the mercenaries there before they can leave with any goods, and hurry the hell up! Ah, wait a minute… there’s word that they’re also planning to test some sort of dangerous new gas, so better you be wearing a gas mask as a precaution, lest you end up dead from the gas.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: You've proven your worth to him, but this is only the beginning. It's time to give it your all- did you really think that TerraGroups abandoned their lab outright? Well... you're wrong.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Congratulations! Those jammers were doing some nasty work, but thanks to your efforts, I've got the wiggle-room I needed to get into and around TerraGroup's systems. Together, we can make a hell of a profit- and I'll be able to prepare for you some stuff that was intended for some of their Special Forces contractors. They should allow you to get a leg up on others looking to unearth the secrets of TerraGroup.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, buddy, you're back- ready for a mission? Perfect. It turns out that I could get external access to TerraGroup's servers, but those spooks managed to lock them down tight with jammers. You're going to go in there and get rid of them- so bring a good kit with you and pack a lunch: you're gonna' need it. I should be able to use those jammers for other things, if you bring them back, to get started.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: It's time to put your talents to the test. Will you be able to repel them and survive? Or will you succumb and suffer the consequences?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Good, you made it through. Nice gun you picked up, they're well-equipped.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Now listen to me. Mercenaries have been shot by scavs in the woods. There must be equipment left where they died, find them and retrieve that equipment. Be careful, Terragroup soldiers are most likely looking for them, so be careful, they're not kidding. Don't hesitate to use the weapon you might find!

tgs_grendel_intelligence.Description: Some crafting plans made by The Specialist for crafting 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cardriges.

tgs_jammer.Name: Electronic jammer
tgs_jammer.Description: Assembled electronic jammer. Emetting electric waves into the connected network for creating huge dysfunction in the system.

tgs_manager_keycard.Name: Lab. Carte magnétique du manager
tgs_manager_keycard.Description: Une carte magnétique provenant du manager du laboratoire. Elle permet d'ouvrir tous les accès à carte magnétique du site.

tgs_powerArmor.Name: Armor vest prototype Redut
tgs_powerArmor.Description: A powered and resistant prototype armor, it offers excellent protection against bullets. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and donated as equipment to the terragroup special forces

tgs_prototype_m16.Name: Assault rifle prototype Colt M4A1 6.5x39mm
tgs_prototype_m16.Description: A prototype of the Colt M4A1 - an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Name: Colt buffer tube
tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Name: Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for Prototype M4A1 assault rifle
tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Description: Upper receiver for M4A1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

tgs_ssdDrive.Name: Crypted SSD
tgs_ssdDrive.Description: Solid State Drive (SSD). Used for data storage with a better read and reading speed. He seems to be crypted and no one seems to know how to access to his datas.

tgs_tgBeacon.Name: Terragroup GPS
tgs_tgBeacon.Description: This GPS device is used to locate Terragroup assault members positions. It isn't as precise as an advanced GPS device for avoiding hacking and members positions leaking.

tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Name: URX 3.1 10.75" handguard for AR15
tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Description: Knights Armament URX 3.1 handguard for AR-15 equipped with a unique interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: A guard from TerraGroup who's been set up at the Laboratory. He knows a lot about the goings-on of that place, but in turn, not many people have any information on him, or knows who he is.

mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: This is a crucial moment for the Specialist's research: what you do now will decide everything, in both the short-term, and the long-term. Will you be able to save the Laboratory?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Hell! That's perfect! You saved the Laboratory equipment and the research! Bought me the time I need to look into their servers and finish off what I can. Come see me later, dodger- I've still got some work for you.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, this is getting bad- they've caught onto us. They're planning on sending mercs to stop us in our tracks by having them go scorched earth on the Laboratory- documents, servers, the whole nine yards. You've got to go in there and make sure they don't get the chance. Get moving, dodger!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: You’ve managed to prevent the mercenaries from recovering and destroying TerraGroup intel and equipment so you won’t be hearing about them for a while. They’re going to have to prepare, but so are you. Give yourself a breather, and prepare for the worst. You’re going to have to reenergize yourself for the upcoming fights. You’re ready? That’s good. Now, the folks at TerraGroup have been preparing very specific stocks...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, this will prevent them from finding the crates and utilizing them! It might save us some trouble down the line. Now, I still have a job for you, so come see me whenever you have the time!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So my boy, I managed to get some information about stocks of experimental drugs hidden in a cache at the mall. Apparently, they were planning to test the drugs on the local population. Intel states that it’s located in some sort of armory, with some MS2000 Markers in the crates so they can be transported. I need you to find out where the crates are located, remove the markers, and report back to me!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: It's starting to get interesting. New syringes have started to crop up containing unknown stimulants, with positive effects that seem promising. It might be enough for TerraGroup to stay afloat- maybe there'll be a time where they'll have more weaponry prototypes, too?
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Thanks for finding me these weapon parts, dodger. Go ahead and assemble the rifle and hand it over- I'll modify it according to plan. In the meantime, there are some files from TerraGroups to... pan over.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Good work, dodger- listen to me, carefully. I need you to bring me a particular weapon- a Colt M4A1 with a 20inch barrel, a Colt buffer tube and a Colt charging handle, a High Standard M4SS Stock, a tan PMAG M3 30 FDE magazine, a colt A2 pistol grip, a URX 3.1 10,75inch handguard, a low-profile MK12 gas block, and that it all comes from the Laboratory. It'd be great if all of it came from there- then I'd be certain it's all compatible with what I want to do. Get moving, buddy!
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: I heard that some encrypted data from TerraGroup had been stolen by a certain someone hiding out with his buddies in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base. I bet there's some good information on it that could be sold for the right price, but... I won't bore you with the details. Get to work, killer.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: I was able to decrypt part of that encrypted data you found on Gluhar. It mentions a former USEC operator working under TerraGroup who's looking for a reliable pair of hands. Considering you're confident, you should take a look at it- apparently, his hideout isn't far from the entrance of some hidden-away laboratory. He might have some valuable equipment lying around.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, listen up, killer. Gluhar and his lackeys are well-armed and well-prepared- and they're expecting trouble. They're over in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base, and tend to patrol around the barracks. You need to put them down and find an encrypted drive on one of them. Kill them, and bring me that damn encrypted drive!
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you'd get out of there unscathed? Well, you can dream, but... it seems like he wants to send you to the grave with this one. Don't believe that it's without risk- everything you do, touch, or breathe on this job will have an impact on your body. Take care, and above all else, take... adequate precautions.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! I didn't believe for a second that you'd make it there, let alone make it back. You wore the mask from start to finish, didn't you? Hand it over, so I can get it properly contained and start taking a look at it- and come see me, when you have time. I've still got work for you.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Perfect, you're back! See, those eggheads down in TerraGroup's laboratories were working on some sort of new material. Their database is too large and too well-protected for me to learn anything about it in the short term, so... you've got some leg-work to do. Find yourself a gas mask, and get moving. Don't take the mask off until the stuff's left your hands.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Expect the unexpected. It's time to take one small leap into the secrets of TerraGroup- there's still a lot to discover, at all. Don't hesitate, and prepare yourself to undergo significant pressure, exertion and stress. Your life and livelihood is at stake.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Ready, dodger? Perfect, because that's the end of your fun. I've prepared something for you- try to make good use of it?
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey, dodger. Finished something for you- go ahead and take it. I don't have a job for you yet, so take advantage of your new-found freetime and prepare yourself. I've made some interesting discoveries, so come back soon and I might be able to tell you what to do.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Despite how hard it was to decrypt the data, Fence's contacts made short work of it. Thanks to them, you've gotten into contact with that ex-USEC operator- but, now he wants you to prove your worth to him. You're going to need to get your hands dirty.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: There you are again! I'm surprised you pulled that off- at least you don't seem like you'll get yourself killed by a bunch of flies. I still need you, so hold on a second: this is important. I have a few more... missions, if you'll take them: and don't worry, I have a good reward in mind.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, dodger, it was you who managed to decrypt my drive? Interesting! You look like too much of a bruiser to have pulled that off without some help- so, you're going to show me that you've got some wits. You know what's hidden away not too far from here- so, you're going to go in there, and fight your way out. Three times. Get the lead out, we don't have all day!
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Now that you've got your hands on your new rifle, you need to find a way to obtain its ammunition. If it was tested in-house by TerraGroup, then maybe there's some in the Laboratory? The Specialist seems to believe it.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! You really found them? Well played! Knew I could count on you- so, listen: I'm going to give you a few for the moment, but not much. Come back later, and I should be able to make more.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Listen, if you want me to make rounds for your new toy, you're going to have to do some legwork. Go down into the Laboratory and find the rounds they were using with the prototype rifle. I don't know where they were stored, so I can't really tell you much more- but try to be logical in your searching, alright?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Finally, things are getting serious. The Specialist is putting the finishing touches on a prototype AR-pattern rifle that was meant to be manufactured by TerraGroup and tested in this self-same Laboratory, but... you still lack the most important part: ammunition. Try not to misplace the rifle, would you?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: And... here! The job's done. I've reassembled the prototype- an M4A1 converted to 6.5x39mm Grendel in-house, but... we don't have the ammunition. Try not to lose it! I don't have what it takes to assemble another right now.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Pass the rifle over, and I can sort out the conversion.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you were quiet the last time you prevented the TerraGroup raid on the Lab. Turns out, you’re wrong. This is only the beginning of a bitter struggle to keep you from getting your hands on confidential Lab intel, and you angered them.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Great, they managed to seize some of the equipment and you didn’t stop them. We just lost some valuable information and assets from TerraGroup that we could have utilized. You’re a damn bother to me!
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, you’ve done a good job again. Here, I managed to get my hands on some prototype armor the scientists were working on while I was still employed under TerraGroup. Take good care of it, it’s the only one I have in stock...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey boy! Listen here, we have a problem on our hands. I just saw a large group of mercenaries enter the Lab. I think they’re back once again to either destroy TerraGroup property or take it for themselves to prevent us from getting our hands on it. Appropriate. Here, take this gear and go defend the Lab. Kill all the mercenaries there before they can leave with any goods, and hurry the hell up! Ah, wait a minute… there’s word that they’re also planning to test some sort of dangerous new gas, so better you be wearing a gas mask as a precaution, lest you end up dead from the gas.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: You've proven your worth to him, but this is only the beginning. It's time to give it your all- did you really think that TerraGroups abandoned their lab outright? Well... you're wrong.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Congratulations! Those jammers were doing some nasty work, but thanks to your efforts, I've got the wiggle-room I needed to get into and around TerraGroup's systems. Together, we can make a hell of a profit- and I'll be able to prepare for you some stuff that was intended for some of their Special Forces contractors. They should allow you to get a leg up on others looking to unearth the secrets of TerraGroup.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, buddy, you're back- ready for a mission? Perfect. It turns out that I could get external access to TerraGroup's servers, but those spooks managed to lock them down tight with jammers. You're going to go in there and get rid of them- so bring a good kit with you and pack a lunch: you're gonna' need it. I should be able to use those jammers for other things, if you bring them back, to get started.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: It's time to put your talents to the test. Will you be able to repel them and survive? Or will you succumb and suffer the consequences?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Good, you made it through. Nice gun you picked up, they're well-equipped.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Now listen to me. Mercenaries have been shot by scavs in the woods. There must be equipment left where they died, find them and retrieve that equipment. Be careful, Terragroup soldiers are most likely looking for them, so be careful, they're not kidding. Don't hesitate to use the weapon you might find!

tgs_338_badnews.Name: "Bad News" .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews.Description: The “Bad News” in .338 Lapua has become a signature rifle for Noreen Firearms. The rifle was originally designed with the intent of taking a well-known large caliber, and being able to send it downrange accurately, further than any other semi-automatic rifle on the market. Now, with the Bad News Gen. II, we’ve taken a rifle that was already a long-distance powerhouse, and completely upgraded it. With new upgraded receivers, a new gas block, and a mean looking hand-guard, the new Bad News takes everything you loved from the first gen, and made it even better. We took a “signature rifle”, and turned it into a masterpiece.

tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Name: "Bad News" Receiver
tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Description: A receiver specially made for "Bad News" rifle in .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum Cartridge
tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire rifle cartridge. It was developed during the 1980s as a high-powered, long-range cartridge for military snipers. It was used in the War in Afghanistan and the Iraq War. As a result of this, it became more widely available. In addition to its military role, it is increasingly used by hunters and civilian long-range shooting enthusiasts. The .338 Lapua Magnum is capable of taking down any game animal, though its suitability for some dangerous game (Cape buffalo, hippopotamus, white rhinoceros, and elephant) is arguable, unless accompanied by a larger "backup" calibre: "There is a huge difference between calibres that will kill an elephant and those that can be relied upon to stop one."

tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Name: 10 Rounds mag .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Description: A 10round magazine specially made for the rifle "Bad News" with .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Name: 6,5x39mm GRENDEL bullet prototype
tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Description: This is a bullet prototype of 6.5x39mm GRENDEL ammo. They are made by the terragroup laboratory.

tgs_armor_prototype.Name: A prototype of a plate carrier vest LBT 6094A
tgs_armor_prototype.Description: A simple and minimalist vest plate holder that can be equipped with a vest. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and given as equipment to the terragroup special forces.

tgs_beacon.Name: MS2000 Marker
tgs_beacon.Description: The marker is used during nighttime operations. It emits signal in the IR region which are visible through NVGs. Uses special filter when operating in the IR mode, if the filter is removed, it appears as a bright flash in the visible spectrum. In the extended mode operates with a blue flash.

tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Name: Blaze Dogtags
tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Description: This is the dogtag of the soldier Blaze, who is working for Terragroup Labs. This is a high valuable item that can be used as a proof that you killed the soldier. Blaze was well known in the mercenaries as very experienced and smart. Maybe not smart enough for you.

tgs_chemical.Name: Chemical container
tgs_chemical.Description: Hermetic container for storing various chemicals. Do not open this container for any reasons.

tgs_chemical_meds.Name: Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_chemical_meds2.Name: Experimental Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds2.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: A guard from TerraGroup who's been set up at the Laboratory. He knows a lot about the goings-on of that place, but in turn, not many people have any information on him, or knows who he is.

mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: Un moment crucial pour les recherches du spécialiste, vous déciderez vous même de la suite et de l'avenir vis à vis de cet individu. Arriverez-vous à mener à bien cette mission relativement ardue ?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Parfait le bouseux, tu as réussi à sauver le matos du laboratoire, et les recherches. Je vais pouvoir continuer à fouiller les serveurs et pouvoir terminer les prototypes qui étaient utilisés là bas. Reviens me voir plus tard, j'ai encore du boulot pour toi.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Bon écoute moi bi en bouseux, ils se sont rendu compte de nos agissements et ont envoyés des mercenaires pour essayer de tout arrêter, un raid va être lancé sur le laboratoire par ces mercenaires et ils prévoient de détruire tous les documents lisibles et les serveurs avec pour nous empêcher de les utilisés. Tu dois éliminer le groupe de raiders qui se rend dans le laboratoire avant qu'ils détruise tout. Alors bouge tes fesses le bouseux, MAINTENANT.
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: Vous êtes parvenu à empecher les mercenaires de récupérer et détruire les documents et l'équipement du laboratoire, vous ne risquez plus d'en entendre parler pendant un moment. Ils vont devoir se préparer, mais vous aussi, ils ne risquent pas d'abandonner, alors, préparez vous au pire. Vous allez devoir préparer des réserves pour combattre. Ca tombe bien, le groupe TerraGroup préparait déjà des stocks bien spécifiques...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Bien joué bouseux, ça les empechera de trouver les caisses de ressources et de s'en servir ! Ca nous sauvera peut-être pour les prochaines fois. J'ai encore du boulot pour toi, alors passe me voir quand tu as le temps !
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alors mon bouseux, j'ai eu des infos qui parlaient de stocks de médicaments expérimentaux au centre commercial. Apparemment ils avaient prévu de tester ces médocs sur des civils et les militaires qui s'y trouvaient. Ils ont surement posé des marqueurs sur ces caisses, alors trouve les, retire les marqueurs et ramène les moi!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: Cela commence à devenir intéressant, de nouvelles seryngues provenant d'un produit inconnu octroyant des effets positifs comme secondaire, que pourrait bien offrir la suite de ses missions ? Peut-être arrivera-t-il un moment où il sera en mesure de fournir de nouveaux prototypes d'armement.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Beau boulot le bouseux, tu as trouvé tout ce que j'ai demandé, maintenant il ne te reste plus qu'à la monter !. En attendant tiens, des dossiers contenant des infos précieuses sur le labo et le groupe terragroup !
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Bon bouseux, écoute moi bien, j'ai besoin que tu me ramènes une arme, mais pas n'importe laquelle ! Il me faudrait une M4A1 avec les équipements suivants dessus : Canon de 20 pouces, Crosse CST avec une crosse M4SS, un LA AR-15, un chargeur GEM M3 30, une poignée de colt A2, un garde-main URX3.1 de 10,75 pouces et un MK12. Ah et trouves moi ça dans le labo, ça serait top si ça provenait de là bas, je serais sur que les accessoires seraient compatibles avec les modifications que j'y apporterais. Allez fonce bouseux !
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: Ok j'ai entendu parler que des données cryptées du laboratoire terragroup avait été dérobé par Gluhar, ce fumier... Il se cache dans la réserve militaire de la région de Tarkov, trouves moi ces données et je te les décrypterais. Elles proviennent du laboratoires alors je n'y vois que du bon, et potentiellement des bons plans comme des prototypes d'équipement ou d'armes à dérober. Au boulot mon gars !
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: J'ai pu décrypter une partie du message dans les données que tu as trouvé sur Gluhar. Elles parlent d'un ancien membre du groupe de défense du laboratoire Terragroup qui recherche une personne digne de confiance. Tu devrais y jeter un oeil. Apparemment sa planque se trouve non loin de l'entrée du laboratoire, je penses que tu es de confiance et qu'il doit avoir du matos expérimental.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Bon écoute bien, Gluhar et ses hommes sont bien armés et préparés, ils se trouvent dans la base militaire, et se baladent souvent près des baraquements. Alors écoute bien, tu dois les tués et chercher sur eux lequel possède les données cryptées, ils sont lourdement armés et s'attendent à recevoir d'autres PMCs pour les pourchassés. Prends les en embuscade, tue les, et ramène moi ce fichu périphérique crypté !
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: Vous pensiez vous en sortir indèmne ? Vous pouvez rêvez, car il vous envoit clairement à l'abbatoire avec cette mission, n'allez pas croire que c'est sans risque... Tout ce que vous faites, touchez, respirez, mangez aura un impact tôt ou tard sur votre corps, alors prenez garde et surtout, prenez les précautions adéquates...
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: WWhoah ! Je ne croyais pas une seconde que tu y arriverais, tu as bien porter le masque du début à la fin n'est-ce pas ? Allez donne moi ce fichu conteneur que j'aille l'éxaminer et voir ce que je peux en tirer. Reviens me voir quand tu auras du temps, j'ai encore des missions pour toi !
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Parfait te revoilà ! Ok écoute moi, les scientifiques travaillaient sur une nouvelle matière, j'ignore encore ses propriétés et son utilité, leur base de donnée est gigantesque. Tu dois allez me récupérer un échantillons de cette matière à l'aide d'un conteneur chimique, tu devrais en trouver un sur place. Ah et une petite précision ! N'oublie pas de t'équiper d'un masque à gaz GP5 pour cette mission, cela devrait t'être utile, récupère le conteneur et sors en portant le masque, ensuite donne moi le conteneur ! Allez fonce bouseux.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Il va falloir vous attendre à tout à partir de maintenant, car il est temps de faire un grand pas dans la découverte de ce laboratoire, il reste encore beaucoup à découvrir. Alors n'hésitez pas, préparez vous mentalement à subir beaucoup de pression et de stress car votre vie est en jeu.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Tu te sens prêt le bouseux ? Parfait car c'est fini la rigolade. Tiens, pendant ce temps j'ai pu te préparer ça. Fais en bon usage.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey le bouseux, je t'ai préparer quelque chose, prends ça. Je n'ai pas encore de boulot pour toi, alors profite pour te reposer et te préparer. J'ai fais des découvertes vachement intéressantes et ça risque de bien t'aider pour la suite, alors reste dans le coin ! Reviens me voir dans peu de temps et je te dirais quoi faire.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Vous avez atteint la planque du garde de terragroup et venez de prendre contact avec lui, bien que déchiffré le périphérique n'était pas simple, vous devez désormais lui prouver votre valeur. Il fait dificilement confiance et a besoin d'un homme fort mentalement pour mener à bien ses objectifs. Bonne chance pour votre nouvelle aventure dans la région de Tarkov !
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: Ah te revoilà ! Bien étonnant, alors tu l'as fais ? C'est intéressant, au moins tu ne te fais pas tuer par de vulgaires mouches. J'ai encore besoin de toi, alors ne te casse pas d'ici, c'est important. J'ai bien évidemment de quoi de récompenser pour les prochaines missions que j'aurais à te confier, mais attention, ne me décois pas bouseux.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey ! Alors c'est toi le bouseux qui a réussi à décryper mon SSD ? Intéressant, tu ne sembles pas faire l'affaire pourtant, comment pourrais-je faire confiance à un bleu, tch. Montre moi ce que tu sais faire le bouseux, non loin d'ici ce trouve l'entrée du labo, vas y et ressort vivant de cet enfer trois fois, ça me prouvera au moins que tu ne te feras pas tué par une mouche. Qu'est ce que tu fais encore là ? Allez bouge ton cul et vas y! Je n'ai pas de temps à perdre. Mais attention si tu y meurs...
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Après l'obtention de votre nouveau fusil d'assault, il faut maintenant trouver un moyen d'obtenir des munitions du calibre correspondant. C'est grace à cette mission que vous pourrez trouver un moyen de vous en procurer et surtout grace aux connaissances du spécialiste. Parviendrez-vous à trouver ces prototypes dans le labyrinthe qu'est le laboratoire ?
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoaaah ! Tu les a vraiment trouvées, bien joué le bouseux, je savais que je pouvais compter sur toi. Bon écoute, je devrais pour t'en filer quelques une pour le moment, mais pas beaucoup, reviens me voir plus tard pour que je puisse t'en faire plus !
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey le bouseux, si tu veux que je puisse te filer des balles pour ton nouveau gun, va falloir que tu ailles bosser. Rends toi dans le labo et trouve moi les prototypes de balles 6,5x39mm GRENDEL, j'ignore où les prototypes ont été stockés alors je ne pourrais t'en dire plus. Je te laisse chercher, mais sois logique dans tes recherches !
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Voilà enfin que les choses sérieuses commencent... Vous vous retrouvez face à votre nouvel équipement qui est un prototype fabriqué par les laboratoires terragroup et testé dans ce même laboratoire. Mais il vous manque encore le plus important pour l'utiliser... Essayez de ne pas la perdre...
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: Et voilà le boulot est fait ! J'ai remonter la version prototype de la M4A1 en calibre 6,5x39mm GRENDEL qui était testé en laboratoire. Seulement il manque encore les munitions. Tâche de ne pas la perdre ! Je n'ai pas encore tout ce qu'il faut pour t'en redonner une.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Tiens bouseux, monte moi cette arme et je pourrais te donner le prototype fabriqué par terragroup.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: Vous pensiez être tranquille pendant un moment après avoir empêcher le dernier raid de terragroup dans le laboratoire, mais vous vous trompiez, ce n'était que le début d'une lutte acharnée pour vous empêcher de mettre la main sur les secrets du laboratoire et vous les appropriés.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Et bah super bouseux, ils ont réussi à emporter de l'équipement et tu ne les en a pas empêcher. On viens de perdre de précieux renseignements ainsi que des pièces qui auraient pu nous servir. Tu me décois !
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Bien joué bouseux, encore une fois tu as bien fait ton boulot. Tiens j'ai retrouvé ce prototype d'armure que les scientifiques nous avaient filé lorsque je travaillais encore pour terragroup, au laboratoire. Prends en soin, je n'ai pour le moment pas d'autre modèles...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey le bouseux ! Ecoute on a un problème, j'viens de voir un important groupe de mercenaires entrer dans le laboratoire, je crois qu'ils sont là encore une fois pour soit détruire le matos soit le reprendre pour nous empecher de nous l'approprié. Tiens prends ce matos et va défendre le labo, tue tous les mercenaires avant qu'ils ne partent avec un quelconque matos, dépèche toi bordel ! Ah et minute, il semblerait qu'ils aient prévu de tester un nouveau gaz dangereux, alors tu ferais mieux de porter un masque à gaz par précaution, histoire de pas finir mort par du gaz.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: Vous venez de lui prouver votre valeur, il ne peut désormais plus nié que vous êtes fait pour le job. Sachez seulement que ce n'est que le début et qu'il vous demandera beaucoup plus à l'avenir, c'est pourquoi c'est maintenant que vous allez devoir donner votre maximum. Vous pensiez le laboratoire abandonné ? Et bien vous vous trompez...
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Alors là mon gars, chapeaux, tu as réussi à me redonner accès aux système du laboratoire, ces boruilleurs empêchait tout accès à ces serveurs, et avec ça, on pourra en tirer des bénéfices. Avec ça, je vais pouvoir te préparer du matos qui était déstiné aux forces spéciales, ils te permettront de venir à bout des autres PMCs qui cherchent à dénicher les secrets du laboratoire.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alors bouseux, de retour pour une mission ? Parfait j'avais justement besoin de toi, il se trouve que je pourrais avoir accès aux serveurs du laboratoires mais, ces foutus raiders y ont placés des brouilleurs électroniques pour les rendre inutilisables. Il faut que tu y ailles et retire les brouilleurs de chaque baie de serveur dans la salle, alors prépare un bon petit paquatage avec toi, tu en aura besoin. Une fois que c'est fait, reviens me voir et donne moi ces brouilleurs je pourrais ensuite accéder aux bases de données et peut-être te fabriquer de nouveaux équipements.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: Il est temps de mettre vos talent à l'épreuve. Serez-vous capable de les repoussés et de survive ? Ou alors succomberez vous et en subirez les conséquences ?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Bien tu t'en est sorti. Sympa cette arme que tu as récupérer, ils sont bien équipés.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Bon écoute moi bien. Des mercenaires ont été abattus par des scavs dans les bois. Il doit rester de l'équipement là où ils sont mort, trouve les et récupère cet équipement. Attention à toi, les soldats de Terragroup sont très probablement à leur recherche, alors soit attentif, ils rigolent pas. N'hésite pas à utiliser l'arme que tu trouvera !

conditions.eightQuest_tgs_Req1: Eliminez 15 raiders dans une même session avec la P-M16A4
conditions.eightQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Survivez à un raid dans le laboratoire

conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir2: Trouvez en raid: Poignée de colt A2

conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir4: Trouvez en raid: Boitier supérieur de M4

conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir7: Trouvez en raid: Canon de 18 pouces pour AR15
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir8: Trouvez en raid: URX 3.1 10,75 pouces pour AR15
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir9: Trouvez en raid: Poignée de transport AR15
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir12: Survivez à un raid dans : Laboratoire

conditions.tenthQuest_tgs_FailCounter: Sortir avant 10 minutes ou mourir dans le laboratoire
