conditions.twelfthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir2: Survivez à un raid sur Woods.

tgs_338_badnews.Name: "Bad News" .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews.Description: Fusil "Bad News" en calibre .338 Lapua Magnum part Noreen Firearms. Ce fusil est redoutable par son calibre et sa puissance de pénétration. Il en fait un excellent fusil.

tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Name: Boitier supérieur .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Description: Un boitier supérieur conçu spécialement pour le fusil "Bad News" en .338 Lapua Magnum.

tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Description: Le .338 Lapua Magnum est une munition d'usage militaire de calibre 8,58 × 70 mm pour les fusils de précision. C'est une munition conçue pour un usage : antipersonnel , mais également utilisable en antimatériel, pour des véhicules légers ou du matériel sensible. De nombreuses armes utilisent ce type de munition : le fusil Accuracy International AWM, le FN Ballista, Le McMillan Tac-338 et bien d'autres.

tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Name: Chargeur de 10 balles .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Description: Un chargeur de 10 cartouches conçu spécialement pour le fusil "Bad News" en .338 Lapua Magnum.

tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Name: Prototype de balle 6,5x39mm GRENDEL
tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Description: Ceci est un prototype de cartouche 6,5x39mm GRENDEL produite par les laboratoires terragroup.

tgs_armor_prototype.Name: Un prototype de gilet porte plaque LBT 6094A
tgs_armor_prototype.Description: Un simple et minimaliste gilet porte plaque équipable avec un gilet. Ce prototype a été conçu dans les laboratoires terragroup et donné en équipement aux forces spéciales terragroup.

tgs_beacon.Name: Balise MS2000
tgs_beacon.Description: Cette balise est utilisée pendant les opérations de nuit. Elle émet des signaux dans le spectre de l’infrarouge (IR) qui ne sont visibles que par le biais de jumelles de vision nocturnes (JVN). Elle utilise un filtre spécial pour émettre en IR, si le filtre est retiré, la balise émet un flash lumineux dans le spectre visible. En mode d'utilisation prolongée elle émet un flash bleu.

tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Name: Plaques TerraGroup - Blaze
tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Description: Ce sont les plaques du soldat Blaze, hautement reconnu dans les rangs de mercenaires du laboratoire TerraGroup. Ces plaques ont une grande valeur, et peut servir comme preuves de sa mort. Il paraît qu'il était très doué et expérimenter sur le terrain, il était également très intelligent.

tgs_chemical.Name: Conteneur de produits chimiques
tgs_chemical.Description: Conteneur hermétique contenant un produit chimique hautement toxique. N'ouvrir ce conteneur sous aucun prétexte !

tgs_chemical_meds.Name: Injecteur chimique
tgs_chemical_meds.Description: Seringue stérile jetable comprenant une dose de produit hautement chimique, les effets de ce produit sont encore inconnus, mais ils ne seront certainement pas sans lourdes conséquences.

tgs_chemical_meds2.Name: Injecteur chimique expérimental
tgs_chemical_meds2.Description: Seringue stérile jetable comprenant une dose de produit hautement chimique, les effets de ce produit sont encore inconnus, mais ils ne seront certainement pas sans lourdes conséquences.

tgs_faceshield_prototype.Name: Prototype Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper mask
tgs_faceshield_prototype.Description: Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper, an additional helmet ballistic mask module based on the Ops Core type, based on the famous movie universe. This is the way.

tgs_genm3_fde.Name: Prototype de chargeur STANAG PMAG GEN M3 26 6,5x39 26 coups
tgs_genm3_fde.Description: Un prototype de chargeur polymère Magpul PMAG GEN M3 26 coups, pour cartouches en 6,5x39.

tgs_grendel_intelligence.Name: Plans de confection cartouche GRENDEL
tgs_grendel_intelligence.Description: Des plans rédigés par le spécialiste permettant la confection de cartouches 6,5x39mm GRENDEL.

tgs_helmet_prototype.Name: Prototype Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper mask
tgs_helmet_prototype.Description: Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper, an additional helmet ballistic mask module based on the Ops Core type, based on the famous movie universe. This is the way.

tgs_jammer.Name: Brouilleur électronique
tgs_jammer.Description: Brouilleur électronique assemblé. Il émet des pulsions électriques dans un réseau afin d'y créer des disfonctionnements importants.

tgs_manager_keycard.Name: Lab. Carte magnétique du manager
tgs_manager_keycard.Description: Une carte magnétique provenant du manager du laboratoire. Elle permet d'ouvrir tous les accès à carte magnétique du site.

tgs_powerArmor.Name: Un prototype d'armure REDUT
tgs_powerArmor.Description: Un simple et minimaliste gilet porte plaque équipable avec un gilet. Ce prototype a été conçu dans les laboratoires terragroup et donné en équipement aux forces spéciales terragroup.

tgs_prototype_m16.Name: Prototype de fusil d'assaut Colt M16A3 6,5x39mm
tgs_prototype_m16.Description: Fusil d'assaut (carabine) Colt M16A3, conçu aux États-Unis sur la base de la plateforme AR-15 et la cartouche de 6,5x39mm Grendel. Il a été développé principalement pour être utilisé par les conducteurs de véhicules et les unités de combat, nécessitant une arme plus compacte et légère qu'un fusil standard, mais utilisant les mêmes munitions. Cependant, l'US SOCOM (Commandement des opérations spéciales des États-Unis) a rapidement adopté le M4A1 pour toutes les unités adjointes, suivi de l'incorporation générale du M4A1 dans l'US Army et dans le corps des Marines.

tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Name: Tube de crosse Colt
tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Description: Tube de crosse télescopique Colt 4 positions de diamètre Mil-Spec utilisable sur toutes les carabines de type AR-15.

tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Name: Boitier supérieur Colt M4A1 5,56x45 pour fusil d'assaut M4A1
tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Description: Boitier supérieur pour fusil d'assaut M4A1 produit par Colt. Équipé d'un rail Picatinny pour l'installation d'accessoires supplémentaires.

tgs_scrap_metal.Name: Pièces détachées d'arme
tgs_scrap_metal.Description: Un large éventail de pièce détachées d'armes nécessaires au remplacement des pièces cassées ou à la production d'armes artisanales.

tgs_ssdDrive.Name: SSD Crypté
tgs_ssdDrive.Description: Solid State Drive (SSD). Utilisé pour stocker des données, avec lecture et écriture améliorées. Il semble crypté et personne ne connait le moyen de le déchiffré...

tgs_tgBeacon.Name: GPS Terragroup
tgs_tgBeacon.Description: Cette balise est utilisée afin de localisé les membres des groupes d'assault de Terragroup. Elle ne permet cependant que d'avoir un emplacement approximatif de cette balise GPS, et non précis.

tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Name: Garde-main URX 3.1 10,75" pour AR-15
tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Description: Garde-main Knights Armament URX 3.1 pour AR-15 équipé d'une interface unique pour l'installation d'équipements et accessoires supplémentaires.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: Ancien garde des forces spéciales du laboratoire terragroup, il connait les lieux comme sa poche et tout ce qu'il s'y passait. Cependant nous n'avons aucune info sur lui, il est inconnu de tous.

mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: Dies ist ein entscheidender Moment für die Forschung des Spezialisten: was du jetzt tust, wird alles entscheiden, sowohl kurzfristig, als auch langfristig. Wirst du in der Lage sein, das Labor zu retten?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Verdammt! Das ist perfekt! Du hast die Laborausstattung und die Forschung gerettet! Hast mir die Zeit gekauft, die ich brauche, um mir ihre Server anzuschauen und zu erledigen, was ich kann. Komm später nochmal, Drückeberger- Ich habe immer noch etwas Arbeit für dich.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alles klar, das sieht nicht gut aus- sie sind auf uns aufmerksam geworden. Sie planen Söldner auf uns zu hetzen, um uns aufzuhalten, indem sie im Labor verbrannte Erde hinterlassen- Dokumente, Server, das volle Programm. Du musst dort rein gehen und sicherstellen, dass sie keine Chance dazu bekommen. Bewegung, Drückeberger!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: Du konntest die Söldner daran hindern sich zu erholen und TerraGroup-Informationen und -Ausrüstung zu zerstören, also wirst auch eine Weile nichts mehr von ihnen hören. Sie werden sich vorbereiten müssen, aber du ebenso. Gönne dir eine Verschnaufpause und bereite dich auf das Schlimmste vor. Du wirst Energie tanken müssen für die bevorstehenden Kämpfe. Bist du bereit? Das ist gut. Na dann, die Leute von TerraGroup haben sehr spezielle Bestände vorbereitet...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Gut gemacht mein Junge, das wird sie daovn abhalten die Kisten zu finden und sie sich zu Nutzen zu machen! Das könnte uns bis auf weiteres einiges an Ärger ersparen. Jetzt habe ich erstmal noch einen Job für dich, also komm vorbei, wann immer du Zeit hast!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So mein Junge, ich konnte an einige Informationen über Bestände experimenteller Medikamente gelangen, die in einem geheimen Lager im Einkaufszentrum versteckt wurden. Anscheinend hatten sie vor, die Medikamente an der hiesigen Bevölkerung zu testen. Meinen Informationen zu folge, befinden sie sich in einer Art Waffenkammer, mit einigen MS2000-Markern in den Kisten, damit sie transportiert werden können. Du musst herausfinden, wo sich die Kisten befinden, entferne die Marker und komme anschließend zu mir zurück!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: Langsam wirds interessant. Neue Spritzen sind aufgetaucht, die unbekannte Stimulanzien mit positiven Effekten enthalten, die vielversprechend zu sein scheinen. Es könnten genug für TerraGroup um sich über Wasser zu halten- vielleicht haben sie irgendwann auch mal mehr Waffenprototypen?
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Danke, dass du diese Waffenteile für mich gefunden hast, Drückeberger. Fang an die Waffe zusammenzubauen und gib sie mir- Ich werde sie wie geplant modifizieren. In der Zwischenzeit, gibt es da einige Akten von TerraGroup, die... den Besitzer wechseln sollten.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Gute Arbeit, Drückeberger- hör mir genau zu. Du musst mir eine bestimmte Waffe bringen- eine Colt M4A1 mit einem 20Zoll-Lauf, Colt Pufferrohr und einem Colt Ladegriff, einer High Standard M4SS Schulterstütze, ein helbraunes PMAG M3 30 FDE Magazin, einen Colt A2 Pistolengriff, einen URX 3.1 10,75inch Handschutz, einen MK12 Niedrigprofil Gasblock und es sollte alles aus dem Labor kommen. Es wäre großartig, wenn alles von dort käme- dann könnte ich sicher sein, dass alles zu dem passt, was ich vor habe. Beweg dich, Kumpel!
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: Ich habe gehört, dass einige verschlüsselte Daten von TerraGroup von einem gewissen Jemand gestohlen wurde, der sich mit seinen Kumpels in der alten Bundesstaats-Reservebasis versteckt. Ich wette, sie enthalten einige brauchbare Informationen, die sich für den richtige Preis verkaufen lassen, aber... Ich werde dich nicht mit Details langweilen. An die Arbeit, Killer.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: Ich konnte einen Teil der verschlüsselten Daten, die du bei Gluhar gefunden hast, entschlüsseln. Sie erwähnen einen ehemaligen USEC-Operator, der für TerraGroup arbeitet und nach einem zuverlässigen Paar Hände sucht. Angesichts deiner Selbstsicherheit, solltest du dir das mal anschauen- Scheinbar bewfindet sich sien Versteck nicht weit entfernt vom Eingang eines versteckten Labors. Vielleicht hat er etwas wertvolle Ausrüstung rumliegen.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alles klar, hör zu, Killer. Gluhar und seine Lackaien sind schwer bewaffnet und gut vorbereitet- und sie erwarten Ärger. Sie sind drüben in der alten Bundesstaats-Reservebasis und sie neigen zu Patrolien um die Kaserne. Du musst sie ausschalten und bei einem von ihnen ein verschlüsseltes Laufwerk finden. Töte sie und bring mir das verdammte verschlüsselte Laufwerk!
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: Du dachtes, du würdest dort unversehrt rauskommen? Naja, träum weiter, aber... aber es sieht so aus, als würde er dich diesmal unter die Erde bringen wollen. Glaube nicht, es wäre risikofrei- alles was du tust, anfasst, oder atmest wird bei diesem Job Auswirkungen auf deinen Körper haben. Nimm dich in acht und vor allem: triff... angemessene Vorsichtsmaßnahmen.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! Ich hatte nicht eine Sekunde lang daran geklaubt, dass du es da drin machen, geschweige denn, dass du es zurück schaffen würdest. Du hast die Maske von anfang bis ende getragen, stimmts? Gib sie mir, damit ich sie angemessen eindämmen und sie mir ansehen kann- und komm vorbei, wenn du Zeit hast. Ich habe immernoch Arbeit für dich.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Perfekt, du bist zurück! Schau, diese Eierköpfe unten in TerraGroups Laboren haben an einer Art neuem Material gearbeitet. Ihre Datenbank ist zu groß und zu gut geschützt, als dass ich kurzfristig etwas davon lernen könnte, deswegen... hast du etwas Beinarbeit zu erledigen. Finde eine Gasmaske und leg los. Nimm die Maske nicht ab, bevor das Zeug deine Hände verlassen hat.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Erwarte das unerwartete. Es ist an der Zeit, einen kleinen Sprung in die Geheimnisse der TerraGroup zu wagen- es gibt sowieso immernoch eine Menge zu entdecken. Zögere nicht und bereite dich darauf vor, beachtlichem Druck, Anstrengungengen und Stress ausgesetzt zu werden. Dein Leben und deine Existenz stehen auf dem Spiel.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Bereit, Drückeberger? Perfekt, denn ab hier hört der Spaß auf. Ich habe etwas für dich vorbereitet- wirst du versuchen, das Beste daraus zu machen?
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey, Drückeberger. Habe was für dich erledigt- na los, nimm schon. Ich habe noch keinen Job für dich, also nutze deine neu gewonnene Freizeit und bereite dich vor. Ich habe ein paar interessante Endeckungen gemacht, also komm bald wieder her, dann kann ich dir vielleicht sagen, was zu tun ist.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Abgesehen davon, wie schwer es war die Daten zu entschlüsseln, haben Fence's Kontakte damit kurzen Prozess gemacht. Dank ihnen, bist du in Kotakt mit dem Ex-USEC-Operator gekommen- aber jetzt will er, dass du ihm deinen Wert unter Beweis stellst. Du wirst dir deine Hände dreckig machen müssen.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: Da bist du ja wieder! Ich bin überrascht, dass du da durchgezogen hast- zumindest sieht es nicht so aus, als würdest du dich von einem Haufen Fliegen töten lassen. Ich brauche dich noch, also warte eine Sekunde: Das hier ist wichtig. Ich habe ein paar mehr... Missionen und wenn du sie übernimmst: mach dir keine Sorgen, mir schwebt da eine nette Belohnung vor.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Also Drückeberger, du warst das, der es geschafft hat mein Laufwerk zu entschlüsseln? Interessant! Du siehst zu sehr nach einem Schlägertyp aus, als dass du das ohne etwas Hilfe hinbekommen hättest- also wirst du mir jetzt zeigen, dass du etwas Verstand hast. Du weißt, was nicht weit von hier versteckt liegt- du wirst jetzt da reingehen und dir deinen Weg wieder raus kämpfen. Drei Mal. Mach schnell, wir haben nicht den ganzen Tag Zeit!
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Jetzt, wo du dein neues Gewehr in den Händen hälst, musst du einen Weg finden, an seine Munition ranzukommen. Wenn es intern von TerraGroup getestet wurde, dann gibt es vielleicht welche im Labor? Der Spezialist scheint das zumindest zu glauben.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! Du hast sie wirklich gefunden? Gut gemacht! Ich uusste, dass ich auf dich zählen kann- also, hör zu: ich gebe dir fürs Erste ein paar, aber nicht viele. Komm später zurück, dann sollte ich in der Lage sein, mehr zu machen.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hör zu, wenn du willst, dass ich Kugeln für dein neues Spielzeug mache, wirst du etwas Beinarbeit erledigen müssen. Geh runter ins Labor und finde die Kugeln, die sie mit dem Prototyp-Gewehr verwendet haben. Ich weiß nicht, wo sie gelagert wurden, also kann ich dir nicht wirklich mehr erzählen- aber versuche bei deiner Suche logisch vorzugehen, alles klar?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Endlich wirds ernst. Der Spezialist ist in den letzten Zügen an einem Protyp-Gewehr nach AR-Schema, das von TerraGroup hätte hergestellt und im gleichen Labor getestet werden sollen, aber... dir fehlt immernoch das wichtigste: Munition. Versuche das Gewehr nicht zu verlegen, OK?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: Und... hier! Der Job ist erledigt. ich habe den Prototypen wieder zusammengebaut- eine M4A1 intern umfunktioniert auf 6.5x39mm Grendel, aber... wir haben die Munition nicht. Versuche sie nicht zu verlieren! ich habe momentan keine Möglichkeit, eine weitere zu bauen.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Lass das Gewehr rüberwachsen, dann kann ich mich um den Umbau kümmern.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: Du dachtest, du wärst das letzte Mal leise gewesen, als du die TerraGroup-Plünderung im Labor verhindert hast. Es hat sich herausgestellt, du hattest unrecht. Das ist nur der Anfang eines erbitterten Kampfes um dich daran zu hindern, an vertrauliche Laborinformationen zu kommen und du hast sie verärgert.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Großartig, sie konnten einen Teil der Ausrüstung an sich reißen und du hast sie nicht daran gehindert. Wir haben gerade einige wertvolle Informationen und Bestände der TerraGroup verloren, die wir hätten nutzen können. Du bist ein verdammtes Ärgernis für mich!
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Gut gemacht Junge, du hast wieder einen guten Job gemacht. Hier, ich konnte an eine Prototyp-Rüstung kommen, an der die Wissenschaftler arbeiteten, während ich noch bei TerraGroup angestellt war. Pass gut darauf auf, das ist die einzige, die ich auf Lager hatte...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey mein Junge! Hör zu, wir haben ein Problem am Hals. Ich habe gerade gesehen, wie eine große Gruppe Söldner das Labor betreten hat. Ich glaube sie sind wieder da, entweder um Eigentum der TerraGroup zu zerstören, oder um es mitzunehmen um zu verhindern, dass es uns in die Hände fällt. Beschlagnahme es. Hier, nimm diese Ausrüstung und verteidige das Labor. Töte dort alle Säldner, bevor sie mit irgendwelchen Gütern verschwinden können und beeil dich, verdammt nochmal! Ah, warte kurz… es gibt Gerüchte, dass sie außerdem planen, eine Art gefährliches neues Gas zu testen, also trage besser eine Gasmaske als Vorsichtmaßnahme, damit du nicht noch an dem Gas verendest.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: Du hast ihm deinen Wert bewiesen, aber das ist nur der Anfang. Es ist an der Zeit, dass du alles gibst- hast du wirklich gedacht, die TerraGroup würde ihr Labor einfach aufgeben? Tja... falsch gedacht.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Glückwunsch! Diese Störsender haben wirklich unangenehme Arbeit verrichtet, aber dank deiner Bemühungen, kann ich mich jetzt in und um TerraGroups System schlängeln. Zusammen können wir einen riesen Profit machen- und ich werde dazu in der Lage sein, was von dem Zeug für dich vorzubereitent, dass eigentlich für die Auftragnehmer ihrer Spezialeinheit gedacht war. Das sollte dir einen Vorsprung gegenüber anderen verschaffen, die versuchen die Geheimnisse der TerraGroup ans Tageslicht zu bringen.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Also Kumpel, du bist zurück- bereit für eine Mission? Perfekt. Es hat sich herausgestellt, dass ich externen Zugang zu den Server der TerraGroup bekommen könnte, aber diese Quälgeister konnten sie durch Störsender sperren. Du wirst dort reingehen und sie verschwinden lassen- also bring gute Ausrüstung und was zum Essen mit: du wirst es brauchen. Ich sollte in der Lage sein, die Störsender für etwas anderes zu verwenden, vorausgesetzt, du bringst sie zurück .
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: Es ist an der Zeit deine Talente zu testen. Wirst du in der Lage sein, sie zurückzustoßen und zu überleben? Oder wirst du unterliegen und die Konsequenzen tragen?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Gut, du hast es raus geschafft. Nette Waffe hast du da aufgesammelt, die sind gut ausgerüstet.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Jetzt hör mir zu. Söldner wurden von Scavs in den Wäldern beschossen. Dort wo sie gestorben sind, muss noch Ausrüstung übrig sein, finde sie und bringe sie zurück. Soldaten der Terragroup such wahrscheinlich nach ihnen, also sei vorsichtig, die spaßen nicht. Zögere nicht die Waffe einzusetzen, die du vielleicht findest!

conditions.eightQuest_tgs_Req1: Eliminiere 15 Raider mit dem P-M4A1-Sturmgewehr in einem einzigen Raid
conditions.eightQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Überlebe und extrahiere aus dem Labor

conditions.eleventhQuest_tgs_FindItem: Finde die Kiste an der Autobahnkreuzung und sammle den Markierer auf.
conditions.eleventhQuest_tgs_Handover: Übergebe den Markierer aus der Kiste.

conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir2: Finde im Raid Colt A2 Griff
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Finde im Raid PMAG GEN M3 30 FDE
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir4: Finde im Raid Oberes Gehäuseteil Colt M4A1
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir6: Finde im Raid Colt AR-15 Ladegriff für AR-15
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir10: Finde im Raid High Standard M4SS Schulterstütze
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir11: Finde im Raid MK12 Niederigprofil Gasblock
conditions.fifthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir12: Überlebe und extrahiere aus dem Labor

conditions.fourthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Überlebe und verlasse das Gebiet, während du eine GP-5 Gasmaske trägst

conditions.secondQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Überlebe und extrahiere von 3 Raids im Labor

conditions.seventhQuest_tgs_Handover: Übergebe den Munitions-Prototypen an den Spezialisten
conditions.seventhQuest_tgs_seventhRequir1: Überlebe und extrahiere aus dem Labor

conditions.tenthQuest_tgs_Req1: Töte 30 Raider im Labor. Du musst eine GP-5 Gasmask tragen
conditions.tenthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Überlebe mindestens 10 Minuten im Labor und extrahiere
conditions.tenthQuest_tgs_FailCounter: Sterbe nicht und extrahier nicht unter 10 Minuten im Labor

conditions.thirdQuest_tgs_FirstRequir1: Entferne die elektronischen Störsender von den Servern
conditions.thirdQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Überlebe und extrahiere aus dem Labor

conditions.twelfthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir3: Finde das GPS-Gerät des toten Raiders.
conditions.twelfthQuest_tgs_FirstRequir: Töte 30 Raider in den Wäldern mit der Ausrüstung des toten Raiders.

tgs_338_badnews.Name: "Bad News" .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews.Description: Die “Bad News” in .338 Lapua wurde ein Wahrzeichen-Gewehr für Noreen Firearms. Das Gewehr wurde ursprünglich mit der Absicht entwickelt, ein bekanntes Großkaliber aufzunehmen und es genauer als jedes andere halbautomatische Gewehr auf dem Markt an das Ziel befördern zu können. Jetzt, mit der Bad News Gen. II, haben wir ein Gewehr, das bereits ein Kraftpaket auf weite Distanz war, genommen und es komplett aufgerüstet. Mit neuen, verbesserten Gehäusen, einem neuen Gasblock und einem gemein aussehenden Handschutz nimmt die neue Bad News alles, was Sie von der ersten Generation an geliebt haben, und macht es noch besser. Wir haben ein „Wahrzeichen-Gewehr“ genommen und daraus ein Meisterwerk gemacht.

tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Name: "Bad News" Gehäuse
tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Description: Ein Gehäuse, speziell angefertig für das "Bad News" Gewehr für die .338 Lapua Magnum Patrone.

tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum Patrone
tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Description: Die .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) ist eine randlose, flaschenhalsförmige, Zentralfeuer-Gewehr-Patrone. Sie wurde in den 1980er Jahren als eine leistungsstarke, Langstrecken-Patrone für militärische Scharfschützen entwickelt. Sie wurde in Afghanistan- und Iraq-Kriegen verwendet. Daraus resultierend, wurde sie weit verbreitet. Zusätzlich zu seiner militärische Rolle, wird sie immer häufiger von Jägern und zivilen Langstrecken-Liebhabern verwendet. Die .338 Lapua Magnum ist in der Lage jedes Wildtier zu erlegen, ob sie auch für gefährliches Wild geeignet ist (Kapbüffel, Nilpferd, Weißes Nashorn und Elefant), ist fraglich, solange es nicht von einem größeren "backup" Kaliber begleitet wird: "Es besteht ein großer Unterschie zwischen Kalibern, die einen Elefant töten und denen, bei denen man sich sicher sein kann, dass sie einen stoppen."

tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Name: 10 Patronen Magazin .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Description: Ein 10 Patronen Magazin speziell hergestellt für das Gewehr "Bad News" mit .338 Lapua Magnum Patronen.

tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Name: 6,5x39mm GRENDEL Geschoss-Prototyp
tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Description: Das ist ein Geschoss-Prototyp der 6.5x39mm GRENDEL Munition. Sie wurde im Terragroup-Labor hergestellt.

tgs_armor_prototype.Name: Der Prototyp einer Plattenträgerweste LBT 6094A
tgs_armor_prototype.Description: Eine einfache und minimalistische Plattenträgerweste, die mit einer Weste ausgerüstet werden kann. Dieser Prototyp wurde im Terragroup-Labor entworfen und Terragroup-Spezialkräften als Ausrüstung zur verfügung gestellt

tgs_beacon.Name: MS2000 Markierer
tgs_beacon.Description: Der Markierer wird im Rahmen von Nachtoperationen verwendet. Er strahlt ein Signal im IR-Bereich aus, das durch Nachtsichgeräte sichtbar wird. Er verwendet einen speziellen Filter, wen im IR-Modus betrieben. Wenn der Filter entfernt wird, taucht er als heller Blitz im sichtbaren Spektrum auf. Im erweiterten Modus arbeitet er mit einem blauen Blitz.

tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Name: Blaze Dogtags
tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Description: Das ist das Dogtag des Soldates Blaze, der für das Terragroup-Labor arbeitet. Dies ist ein sehr wertvoller Gegenstand, der als Beweis dafür verwendet werden kann, dass du den Soldaten getötet hast. Blaze war unter den Söldnern dafür bekannt, sehr erfahren und schlau zu sein. Vielleicht nicht schlau genug für dich.

tgs_chemical.Name: Chemischer Behälter
tgs_chemical.Description: Hermetischer Behälter für verschiedene, starke Chemikalien. Öffne diesen Behälter unter keinen Umständen.

tgs_chemical_meds.Name: Cehmischer Injektor
tgs_chemical_meds.Description: Sterile, wegwerfbare Spritze mit einer Dosis hochgiftiger Chemikalien. Die Effekte dieser Chemikalie sind noch unbekannt. Womit wir uns allerdings sicher sind ist, dass es dir ziehmlich mies gehen wird, wenn du sie verwendest.

tgs_chemical_meds2.Name: Experimenteller chemischer Injektor
tgs_chemical_meds2.Description: Sterile, wegwerfbare Spritze mit einer Dosis hochgiftiger Chemikalien. Die Effekte dieser Chemikalie sind noch unbekannt. Womit wir uns allerdings sicher sind ist, dass es dir ziehmlich mies gehen wird, wenn du sie verwendest.

tgs_genm3_fde.Name: PMAG GEN M3 26 6.5x39 GRENDEL 26-Patronen Magazin-Prototyp
tgs_genm3_fde.Description: Ein 26-Patronen Polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 26 Magazin-Prototyp, für 6.5x39 Munition, entworfen für die Verwendung mit der P-M4A1.

tgs_grendel_intelligence.Name: Plan zur Herstellung der GRENDEL Patrone
tgs_grendel_intelligence.Description: Pläne vom Speczialist zur Herstellung von 6.5x39mm GRENDEL Patronen.

tgs_jammer.Name: Elektronischer Störsender
tgs_jammer.Description: Zusammengebauter elektronischer Störsender. Strahlte elektrische Wellen in das verbundene Netzwerk aus, um im System eine riesiege Fehlfunktion auszulösen.

tgs_manager_keycard.Name: Labor Magnetkarte des Managers
tgs_manager_keycard.Description: Eine Magnetkarte des Laborleiters. Du kannst damit den gesamten Magnetkartenzugriff auf die Einrichtung öffnen.

tgs_powerArmor.Name: Körperpanzerung-Prototyp Redut
tgs_powerArmor.Description: Eine angetriebener und resistenter Prototyp einer Körperpanzerung, er bietet exzelenten Schutz gegen Kugeln. Dieser Prototyp wurde im Terragroup-Labor entworfen und Terragroup-Spezialkräften als Ausrüstung zur Verfügung gestellt

tgs_prototype_m16.Name: Sturmgewehr-Prototyp Colt M4A1 6.5x39mm
tgs_prototype_m16.Description: Ein Prototyp der Colt M4A1 - ein Sturmgewehr (Karabiner), entworfen in den USA auf Basis der AR-15 Platform für die 6.5x39mm GRENDEL Patrone. Es wurde in erste Linie zur Nutzung von Fahrzeugführern Schützengruppen entwickelt, die eine kompaktere und leichtere Waffe, als standard Gewehre in voller Länge benötigten, aber sie als Nachschub verwenden wollten. Allerdings setzte die US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) die M4A1 für alle untergeodneten Einheiten ein, gefolgt von einer generellen Einführung der M4A1 in den Dienst der US Army und der Marine Corps.

tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Name: Colt Pufferrohr
tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Description: Colt Gehäuse-Pufferrohr-Erweiterung, 4-Position, Mil-Spec Diameter passt auf jeden auf AR-15-basierenden Karabiner.

tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Name: Oberes Gehäuseteil Colt M4A1 5.56x45 für Prototyp-M4A1-Sturmgewehre
tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Description: Oberes Gehäuseteil für das M4A1 Sturmgewehr, hergestellt von Colt. Ausgestattet mit einer Vorrichtung zur Anbringung zusätzlicher Geräte.

tgs_ssdDrive.Name: Verschlüsselte SSD
tgs_ssdDrive.Description: Solid State Drive (SSD). Wird zur Datenspeicherung mit einer besseren Lese- und Schreibegeschwindigkeit verwendet. Sie scheint verschlüsselt zur sein und niemand weiß, wie man an ihre Daten herankommt.

tgs_tgBeacon.Name: Terragroup GPS
tgs_tgBeacon.Description: Dieses GPS-Gerät, wird verwendet um die Position von Terragroup-Sturmtruppen zu ermitteln. Es ist nicht so präzise wie ein fortschrittliches GPS-Gerät um Hackerangriffe und das Durchsickern von Truppenpositionen zu vermeiden.

tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Name: URX 3.1 10.75" Handschutz für das AR15
tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Description: Knights Armament URX 3.1 Handschutz für das AR-15 ausgestattet mit einer einzigartigen Vorrichtung für die Installation von zusätzliche Geräten und Zubehör.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: Ein Wachmann der TerraGroup der in das Labor entsand wurde. Er weiß eine menge darüber, was an diesem ort vor sich geht, aber umgekehrt haben nicht besonders viele Leute Informationen über ihn, oder wissen, wer er überhaupt ist.

mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: This is a crucial moment for the Specialist's research: what you do now will decide everything, in both the short-term, and the long-term. Will you be able to save the Laboratory?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Hell! That's perfect! You saved the Laboratory equipment and the research! Bought me the time I need to look into their servers and finish off what I can. Come see me later, dodger- I've still got some work for you.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, this is getting bad- they've caught onto us. They're planning on sending mercs to stop us in our tracks by having them go scorched earth on the Laboratory- documents, servers, the whole nine yards. You've got to go in there and make sure they don't get the chance. Get moving, dodger!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: You’ve managed to prevent the mercenaries from recovering and destroying TerraGroup intel and equipment so you won’t be hearing about them for a while. They’re going to have to prepare, but so are you. Give yourself a breather, and prepare for the worst. You’re going to have to reenergize yourself for the upcoming fights. You’re ready? That’s good. Now, the folks at TerraGroup have been preparing very specific stocks...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, this will prevent them from finding the crates and utilizing them! It might save us some trouble down the line. Now, I still have a job for you, so come see me whenever you have the time!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So my boy, I managed to get some information about stocks of experimental drugs hidden in a cache at the mall. Apparently, they were planning to test the drugs on the local population. Intel states that it’s located in some sort of armory, with some MS2000 Markers in the crates so they can be transported. I need you to find out where the crates are located, remove the markers, and report back to me!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: It's starting to get interesting. New syringes have started to crop up containing unknown stimulants, with positive effects that seem promising. It might be enough for TerraGroup to stay afloat- maybe there'll be a time where they'll have more weaponry prototypes, too?
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Thanks for finding me these weapon parts, dodger. Go ahead and assemble the rifle and hand it over- I'll modify it according to plan. In the meantime, there are some files from TerraGroups to... pan over.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Good work, dodger- listen to me, carefully. I need you to bring me a particular weapon- a Colt M4A1 with a 20inch barrel, a Colt buffer tube and a Colt charging handle, a High Standard M4SS Stock, a tan PMAG M3 30 FDE magazine, a colt A2 pistol grip, a URX 3.1 10,75inch handguard, a low-profile MK12 gas block, and that it all comes from the Laboratory. It'd be great if all of it came from there- then I'd be certain it's all compatible with what I want to do. Get moving, buddy!
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: I heard that some encrypted data from TerraGroup had been stolen by a certain someone hiding out with his buddies in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base. I bet there's some good information on it that could be sold for the right price, but... I won't bore you with the details. Get to work, killer.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: I was able to decrypt part of that encrypted data you found on Gluhar. It mentions a former USEC operator working under TerraGroup who's looking for a reliable pair of hands. Considering you're confident, you should take a look at it- apparently, his hideout isn't far from the entrance of some hidden-away laboratory. He might have some valuable equipment lying around.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, listen up, killer. Gluhar and his lackeys are well-armed and well-prepared- and they're expecting trouble. They're over in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base, and tend to patrol around the barracks. You need to put them down and find an encrypted drive on one of them. Kill them, and bring me that damn encrypted drive!
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you'd get out of there unscathed? Well, you can dream, but... it seems like he wants to send you to the grave with this one. Don't believe that it's without risk- everything you do, touch, or breathe on this job will have an impact on your body. Take care, and above all else, take... adequate precautions.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! I didn't believe for a second that you'd make it there, let alone make it back. You wore the mask from start to finish, didn't you? Hand it over, so I can get it properly contained and start taking a look at it- and come see me, when you have time. I've still got work for you.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Perfect, you're back! See, those eggheads down in TerraGroup's laboratories were working on some sort of new material. Their database is too large and too well-protected for me to learn anything about it in the short term, so... you've got some leg-work to do. Find yourself a gas mask, and get moving. Don't take the mask off until the stuff's left your hands.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Expect the unexpected. It's time to take one small leap into the secrets of TerraGroup- there's still a lot to discover, at all. Don't hesitate, and prepare yourself to undergo significant pressure, exertion and stress. Your life and livelihood is at stake.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Ready, dodger? Perfect, because that's the end of your fun. I've prepared something for you- try to make good use of it?
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey, dodger. Finished something for you- go ahead and take it. I don't have a job for you yet, so take advantage of your new-found freetime and prepare yourself. I've made some interesting discoveries, so come back soon and I might be able to tell you what to do.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Despite how hard it was to decrypt the data, Fence's contacts made short work of it. Thanks to them, you've gotten into contact with that ex-USEC operator- but, now he wants you to prove your worth to him. You're going to need to get your hands dirty.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: There you are again! I'm surprised you pulled that off- at least you don't seem like you'll get yourself killed by a bunch of flies. I still need you, so hold on a second: this is important. I have a few more... missions, if you'll take them: and don't worry, I have a good reward in mind.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, dodger, it was you who managed to decrypt my drive? Interesting! You look like too much of a bruiser to have pulled that off without some help- so, you're going to show me that you've got some wits. You know what's hidden away not too far from here- so, you're going to go in there, and fight your way out. Three times. Get the lead out, we don't have all day!
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Now that you've got your hands on your new rifle, you need to find a way to obtain its ammunition. If it was tested in-house by TerraGroup, then maybe there's some in the Laboratory? The Specialist seems to believe it.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! You really found them? Well played! Knew I could count on you- so, listen: I'm going to give you a few for the moment, but not much. Come back later, and I should be able to make more.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Listen, if you want me to make rounds for your new toy, you're going to have to do some legwork. Go down into the Laboratory and find the rounds they were using with the prototype rifle. I don't know where they were stored, so I can't really tell you much more- but try to be logical in your searching, alright?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Finally, things are getting serious. The Specialist is putting the finishing touches on a prototype AR-pattern rifle that was meant to be manufactured by TerraGroup and tested in this self-same Laboratory, but... you still lack the most important part: ammunition. Try not to misplace the rifle, would you?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: And... here! The job's done. I've reassembled the prototype- an M4A1 converted to 6.5x39mm Grendel in-house, but... we don't have the ammunition. Try not to lose it! I don't have what it takes to assemble another right now.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Pass the rifle over, and I can sort out the conversion.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you were quiet the last time you prevented the TerraGroup raid on the Lab. Turns out, you’re wrong. This is only the beginning of a bitter struggle to keep you from getting your hands on confidential Lab intel, and you angered them.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Great, they managed to seize some of the equipment and you didn’t stop them. We just lost some valuable information and assets from TerraGroup that we could have utilized. You’re a damn bother to me!
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, you’ve done a good job again. Here, I managed to get my hands on some prototype armor the scientists were working on while I was still employed under TerraGroup. Take good care of it, it’s the only one I have in stock...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey boy! Listen here, we have a problem on our hands. I just saw a large group of mercenaries enter the Lab. I think they’re back once again to either destroy TerraGroup property or take it for themselves to prevent us from getting our hands on it. Appropriate. Here, take this gear and go defend the Lab. Kill all the mercenaries there before they can leave with any goods, and hurry the hell up! Ah, wait a minute… there’s word that they’re also planning to test some sort of dangerous new gas, so better you be wearing a gas mask as a precaution, lest you end up dead from the gas.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: You've proven your worth to him, but this is only the beginning. It's time to give it your all- did you really think that TerraGroups abandoned their lab outright? Well... you're wrong.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Congratulations! Those jammers were doing some nasty work, but thanks to your efforts, I've got the wiggle-room I needed to get into and around TerraGroup's systems. Together, we can make a hell of a profit- and I'll be able to prepare for you some stuff that was intended for some of their Special Forces contractors. They should allow you to get a leg up on others looking to unearth the secrets of TerraGroup.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, buddy, you're back- ready for a mission? Perfect. It turns out that I could get external access to TerraGroup's servers, but those spooks managed to lock them down tight with jammers. You're going to go in there and get rid of them- so bring a good kit with you and pack a lunch: you're gonna' need it. I should be able to use those jammers for other things, if you bring them back, to get started.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: It's time to put your talents to the test. Will you be able to repel them and survive? Or will you succumb and suffer the consequences?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Good, you made it through. Nice gun you picked up, they're well-equipped.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Now listen to me. Mercenaries have been shot by scavs in the woods. There must be equipment left where they died, find them and retrieve that equipment. Be careful, Terragroup soldiers are most likely looking for them, so be careful, they're not kidding. Don't hesitate to use the weapon you might find!

tgs_338_badnews.Name: "Bad News" .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews.Description: The “Bad News” in .338 Lapua has become a signature rifle for Noreen Firearms. The rifle was originally designed with the intent of taking a well-known large caliber, and being able to send it downrange accurately, further than any other semi-automatic rifle on the market. Now, with the Bad News Gen. II, we’ve taken a rifle that was already a long-distance powerhouse, and completely upgraded it. With new upgraded receivers, a new gas block, and a mean looking hand-guard, the new Bad News takes everything you loved from the first gen, and made it even better. We took a “signature rifle”, and turned it into a masterpiece.

tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Name: "Bad News" Receiver
tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Description: A receiver specially made for "Bad News" rifle in .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum Cartridge
tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire rifle cartridge. It was developed during the 1980s as a high-powered, long-range cartridge for military snipers. It was used in the War in Afghanistan and the Iraq War. As a result of this, it became more widely available. In addition to its military role, it is increasingly used by hunters and civilian long-range shooting enthusiasts. The .338 Lapua Magnum is capable of taking down any game animal, though its suitability for some dangerous game (Cape buffalo, hippopotamus, white rhinoceros, and elephant) is arguable, unless accompanied by a larger "backup" calibre: "There is a huge difference between calibres that will kill an elephant and those that can be relied upon to stop one."

tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Name: 10 Rounds mag .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Description: A 10round magazine specially made for the rifle "Bad News" with .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Name: 6,5x39mm GRENDEL bullet prototype
tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Description: This is a bullet prototype of 6.5x39mm GRENDEL ammo. They are made by the terragroup laboratory.

tgs_armor_prototype.Name: A prototype of a plate carrier vest LBT 6094A
tgs_armor_prototype.Description: A simple and minimalist vest plate holder that can be equipped with a vest. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and given as equipment to the terragroup special forces.

tgs_beacon.Name: MS2000 Marker
tgs_beacon.Description: The marker is used during nighttime operations. It emits signal in the IR region which are visible through NVGs. Uses special filter when operating in the IR mode, if the filter is removed, it appears as a bright flash in the visible spectrum. In the extended mode operates with a blue flash.

tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Name: Blaze Dogtags
tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Description: This is the dogtag of the soldier Blaze, who is working for Terragroup Labs. This is a high valuable item that can be used as a proof that you killed the soldier. Blaze was well known in the mercenaries as very experienced and smart. Maybe not smart enough for you.

tgs_chemical.Name: Chemical container
tgs_chemical.Description: Hermetic container for storing various chemicals. Do not open this container for any reasons.

tgs_chemical_meds.Name: Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_chemical_meds2.Name: Experimental Chemical injector
tgs_chemical_meds2.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_genm3_fde.Name: PMAG GEN M3 26 6.5x39 GRENDEL 26-round magazine prototype
tgs_genm3_fde.Description: A 26-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 26 magazine prototype, for 6.5x39 ammunition designed to be used with the P-M4A1.

tgs_grendel_intelligence.Name: Crafting plans for GRENDEL cardrige
tgs_grendel_intelligence.Description: Some crafting plans made by The Specialist for crafting 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cardriges.

tgs_jammer.Name: Electronic jammer
tgs_jammer.Description: Assembled electronic jammer. Emetting electric waves into the connected network for creating huge dysfunction in the system.

tgs_manager_keycard.Name: Lab. Carte magnétique du manager
tgs_manager_keycard.Description: Une carte magnétique provenant du manager du laboratoire. Elle permet d'ouvrir tous les accès à carte magnétique du site.

tgs_powerArmor.Name: Armor vest prototype Redut
tgs_powerArmor.Description: A powered and resistant prototype armor, it offers excellent protection against bullets. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and donated as equipment to the terragroup special forces

tgs_prototype_m16.Name: Assault rifle prototype Colt M4A1 6.5x39mm
tgs_prototype_m16.Description: A prototype of the Colt M4A1 - an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Name: Colt buffer tube
tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Name: Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for Prototype M4A1 assault rifle
tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Description: Upper receiver for M4A1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

tgs_ssdDrive.Name: Crypted SSD
tgs_ssdDrive.Description: Solid State Drive (SSD). Used for data storage with a better read and reading speed. He seems to be crypted and no one seems to know how to access to his datas.

tgs_tgBeacon.Name: Terragroup GPS
tgs_tgBeacon.Description: This GPS device is used to locate Terragroup assault members positions. It isn't as precise as an advanced GPS device for avoiding hacking and members positions leaking.

tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Name: URX 3.1 10.75" handguard for AR15
tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Description: Knights Armament URX 3.1 handguard for AR-15 equipped with a unique interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: A guard from TerraGroup who's been set up at the Laboratory. He knows a lot about the goings-on of that place, but in turn, not many people have any information on him, or knows who he is.

mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: This is a crucial moment for the Specialist's research: what you do now will decide everything, in both the short-term, and the long-term. Will you be able to save the Laboratory?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Hell! That's perfect! You saved the Laboratory equipment and the research! Bought me the time I need to look into their servers and finish off what I can. Come see me later, dodger- I've still got some work for you.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, this is getting bad- they've caught onto us. They're planning on sending mercs to stop us in our tracks by having them go scorched earth on the Laboratory- documents, servers, the whole nine yards. You've got to go in there and make sure they don't get the chance. Get moving, dodger!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: You’ve managed to prevent the mercenaries from recovering and destroying TerraGroup intel and equipment so you won’t be hearing about them for a while. They’re going to have to prepare, but so are you. Give yourself a breather, and prepare for the worst. You’re going to have to reenergize yourself for the upcoming fights. You’re ready? That’s good. Now, the folks at TerraGroup have been preparing very specific stocks...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, this will prevent them from finding the crates and utilizing them! It might save us some trouble down the line. Now, I still have a job for you, so come see me whenever you have the time!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So my boy, I managed to get some information about stocks of experimental drugs hidden in a cache at the mall. Apparently, they were planning to test the drugs on the local population. Intel states that it’s located in some sort of armory, with some MS2000 Markers in the crates so they can be transported. I need you to find out where the crates are located, remove the markers, and report back to me!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: It's starting to get interesting. New syringes have started to crop up containing unknown stimulants, with positive effects that seem promising. It might be enough for TerraGroup to stay afloat- maybe there'll be a time where they'll have more weaponry prototypes, too?
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Thanks for finding me these weapon parts, dodger. Go ahead and assemble the rifle and hand it over- I'll modify it according to plan. In the meantime, there are some files from TerraGroups to... pan over.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Good work, dodger- listen to me, carefully. I need you to bring me a particular weapon- a Colt M4A1 with a 20inch barrel, a Colt buffer tube and a Colt charging handle, a High Standard M4SS Stock, a tan PMAG M3 30 FDE magazine, a colt A2 pistol grip, a URX 3.1 10,75inch handguard, a low-profile MK12 gas block, and that it all comes from the Laboratory. It'd be great if all of it came from there- then I'd be certain it's all compatible with what I want to do. Get moving, buddy!
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: I heard that some encrypted data from TerraGroup had been stolen by a certain someone hiding out with his buddies in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base. I bet there's some good information on it that could be sold for the right price, but... I won't bore you with the details. Get to work, killer.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: I was able to decrypt part of that encrypted data you found on Gluhar. It mentions a former USEC operator working under TerraGroup who's looking for a reliable pair of hands. Considering you're confident, you should take a look at it- apparently, his hideout isn't far from the entrance of some hidden-away laboratory. He might have some valuable equipment lying around.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, listen up, killer. Gluhar and his lackeys are well-armed and well-prepared- and they're expecting trouble. They're over in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base, and tend to patrol around the barracks. You need to put them down and find an encrypted drive on one of them. Kill them, and bring me that damn encrypted drive!
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you'd get out of there unscathed? Well, you can dream, but... it seems like he wants to send you to the grave with this one. Don't believe that it's without risk- everything you do, touch, or breathe on this job will have an impact on your body. Take care, and above all else, take... adequate precautions.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! I didn't believe for a second that you'd make it there, let alone make it back. You wore the mask from start to finish, didn't you? Hand it over, so I can get it properly contained and start taking a look at it- and come see me, when you have time. I've still got work for you.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Perfect, you're back! See, those eggheads down in TerraGroup's laboratories were working on some sort of new material. Their database is too large and too well-protected for me to learn anything about it in the short term, so... you've got some leg-work to do. Find yourself a gas mask, and get moving. Don't take the mask off until the stuff's left your hands.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Expect the unexpected. It's time to take one small leap into the secrets of TerraGroup- there's still a lot to discover, at all. Don't hesitate, and prepare yourself to undergo significant pressure, exertion and stress. Your life and livelihood is at stake.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Ready, dodger? Perfect, because that's the end of your fun. I've prepared something for you- try to make good use of it?
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey, dodger. Finished something for you- go ahead and take it. I don't have a job for you yet, so take advantage of your new-found freetime and prepare yourself. I've made some interesting discoveries, so come back soon and I might be able to tell you what to do.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Despite how hard it was to decrypt the data, Fence's contacts made short work of it. Thanks to them, you've gotten into contact with that ex-USEC operator- but, now he wants you to prove your worth to him. You're going to need to get your hands dirty.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: There you are again! I'm surprised you pulled that off- at least you don't seem like you'll get yourself killed by a bunch of flies. I still need you, so hold on a second: this is important. I have a few more... missions, if you'll take them: and don't worry, I have a good reward in mind.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, dodger, it was you who managed to decrypt my drive? Interesting! You look like too much of a bruiser to have pulled that off without some help- so, you're going to show me that you've got some wits. You know what's hidden away not too far from here- so, you're going to go in there, and fight your way out. Three times. Get the lead out, we don't have all day!
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Now that you've got your hands on your new rifle, you need to find a way to obtain its ammunition. If it was tested in-house by TerraGroup, then maybe there's some in the Laboratory? The Specialist seems to believe it.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! You really found them? Well played! Knew I could count on you- so, listen: I'm going to give you a few for the moment, but not much. Come back later, and I should be able to make more.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Listen, if you want me to make rounds for your new toy, you're going to have to do some legwork. Go down into the Laboratory and find the rounds they were using with the prototype rifle. I don't know where they were stored, so I can't really tell you much more- but try to be logical in your searching, alright?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Finally, things are getting serious. The Specialist is putting the finishing touches on a prototype AR-pattern rifle that was meant to be manufactured by TerraGroup and tested in this self-same Laboratory, but... you still lack the most important part: ammunition. Try not to misplace the rifle, would you?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: And... here! The job's done. I've reassembled the prototype- an M4A1 converted to 6.5x39mm Grendel in-house, but... we don't have the ammunition. Try not to lose it! I don't have what it takes to assemble another right now.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Pass the rifle over, and I can sort out the conversion.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you were quiet the last time you prevented the TerraGroup raid on the Lab. Turns out, you’re wrong. This is only the beginning of a bitter struggle to keep you from getting your hands on confidential Lab intel, and you angered them.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Great, they managed to seize some of the equipment and you didn’t stop them. We just lost some valuable information and assets from TerraGroup that we could have utilized. You’re a damn bother to me!
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, you’ve done a good job again. Here, I managed to get my hands on some prototype armor the scientists were working on while I was still employed under TerraGroup. Take good care of it, it’s the only one I have in stock...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey boy! Listen here, we have a problem on our hands. I just saw a large group of mercenaries enter the Lab. I think they’re back once again to either destroy TerraGroup property or take it for themselves to prevent us from getting our hands on it. Appropriate. Here, take this gear and go defend the Lab. Kill all the mercenaries there before they can leave with any goods, and hurry the hell up! Ah, wait a minute… there’s word that they’re also planning to test some sort of dangerous new gas, so better you be wearing a gas mask as a precaution, lest you end up dead from the gas.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: You've proven your worth to him, but this is only the beginning. It's time to give it your all- did you really think that TerraGroups abandoned their lab outright? Well... you're wrong.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Congratulations! Those jammers were doing some nasty work, but thanks to your efforts, I've got the wiggle-room I needed to get into and around TerraGroup's systems. Together, we can make a hell of a profit- and I'll be able to prepare for you some stuff that was intended for some of their Special Forces contractors. They should allow you to get a leg up on others looking to unearth the secrets of TerraGroup.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, buddy, you're back- ready for a mission? Perfect. It turns out that I could get external access to TerraGroup's servers, but those spooks managed to lock them down tight with jammers. You're going to go in there and get rid of them- so bring a good kit with you and pack a lunch: you're gonna' need it. I should be able to use those jammers for other things, if you bring them back, to get started.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: It's time to put your talents to the test. Will you be able to repel them and survive? Or will you succumb and suffer the consequences?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Good, you made it through. Nice gun you picked up, they're well-equipped.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Now listen to me. Mercenaries have been shot by scavs in the woods. There must be equipment left where they died, find them and retrieve that equipment. Be careful, Terragroup soldiers are most likely looking for them, so be careful, they're not kidding. Don't hesitate to use the weapon you might find!

tgs_chemical_meds2.Description: Sterile desposable syringe with a dose of high toxic chemicals , efects of this chemical are still unknow. What we are sure is they will give you a really bad time if you use it.

tgs_genm3_fde.Name: PMAG GEN M3 26 6.5x39 GRENDEL 26-round magazine prototype
tgs_genm3_fde.Description: A 26-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 26 magazine prototype, for 6.5x39 ammunition designed to be used with the P-M4A1.

tgs_grendel_intelligence.Name: Crafting plans for GRENDEL cardrige
tgs_grendel_intelligence.Description: Some crafting plans made by The Specialist for crafting 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cardriges.

tgs_jammer.Name: Electronic jammer
tgs_jammer.Description: Assembled electronic jammer. Emetting electric waves into the connected network for creating huge dysfunction in the system.

tgs_manager_keycard.Description: Une carte magnétique provenant du manager du laboratoire. Elle permet d'ouvrir tous les accès à carte magnétique du site.

tgs_powerArmor.Name: Armor vest prototype Redut
tgs_powerArmor.Description: A powered and resistant prototype armor, it offers excellent protection against bullets. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and donated as equipment to the terragroup special forces

tgs_prototype_m16.Name: Assault rifle prototype Colt M4A1 6.5x39mm
tgs_prototype_m16.Description: A prototype of the Colt M4A1 - an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 6.5x39mm GRENDEL cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Name: Colt buffer tube
tgs_prototype_m16_stock.Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Name: Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for Prototype M4A1 assault rifle
tgs_prototype_m16_upper.Description: Upper receiver for M4A1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

tgs_ssdDrive.Name: Crypted SSD
tgs_ssdDrive.Description: Solid State Drive (SSD). Used for data storage with a better read and reading speed. He seems to be crypted and no one seems to know how to access to his datas.

tgs_tgBeacon.Name: Terragroup GPS
tgs_tgBeacon.Description: This GPS device is used to locate Terragroup assault members positions. It isn't as precise as an advanced GPS device for avoiding hacking and members positions leaking.

tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Name: URX 3.1 10.75" handguard for AR15
tgs_urx_31_10_handguard.Description: Knights Armament URX 3.1 handguard for AR-15 equipped with a unique interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

TerraGroup_Specialist.Description: A guard from TerraGroup who's been set up at the Laboratory. He knows a lot about the goings-on of that place, but in turn, not many people have any information on him, or knows who he is.

mail.eightQuest_tgs_description: This is a crucial moment for the Specialist's research: what you do now will decide everything, in both the short-term, and the long-term. Will you be able to save the Laboratory?
mail.eightQuest_tgs_mail: Hell! That's perfect! You saved the Laboratory equipment and the research! Bought me the time I need to look into their servers and finish off what I can. Come see me later, dodger- I've still got some work for you.
mail.eightQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, this is getting bad- they've caught onto us. They're planning on sending mercs to stop us in our tracks by having them go scorched earth on the Laboratory- documents, servers, the whole nine yards. You've got to go in there and make sure they don't get the chance. Get moving, dodger!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_description: You’ve managed to prevent the mercenaries from recovering and destroying TerraGroup intel and equipment so you won’t be hearing about them for a while. They’re going to have to prepare, but so are you. Give yourself a breather, and prepare for the worst. You’re going to have to reenergize yourself for the upcoming fights. You’re ready? That’s good. Now, the folks at TerraGroup have been preparing very specific stocks...
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, this will prevent them from finding the crates and utilizing them! It might save us some trouble down the line. Now, I still have a job for you, so come see me whenever you have the time!
mail.eleventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So my boy, I managed to get some information about stocks of experimental drugs hidden in a cache at the mall. Apparently, they were planning to test the drugs on the local population. Intel states that it’s located in some sort of armory, with some MS2000 Markers in the crates so they can be transported. I need you to find out where the crates are located, remove the markers, and report back to me!
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_description: It's starting to get interesting. New syringes have started to crop up containing unknown stimulants, with positive effects that seem promising. It might be enough for TerraGroup to stay afloat- maybe there'll be a time where they'll have more weaponry prototypes, too?
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_mail: Thanks for finding me these weapon parts, dodger. Go ahead and assemble the rifle and hand it over- I'll modify it according to plan. In the meantime, there are some files from TerraGroups to... pan over.
mail.fifthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Good work, dodger- listen to me, carefully. I need you to bring me a particular weapon- a Colt M4A1 with a 20inch barrel, a Colt buffer tube and a Colt charging handle, a High Standard M4SS Stock, a tan PMAG M3 30 FDE magazine, a colt A2 pistol grip, a URX 3.1 10,75inch handguard, a low-profile MK12 gas block, and that it all comes from the Laboratory. It'd be great if all of it came from there- then I'd be certain it's all compatible with what I want to do. Get moving, buddy!
mail.firstQuest_tgs_description: I heard that some encrypted data from TerraGroup had been stolen by a certain someone hiding out with his buddies in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base. I bet there's some good information on it that could be sold for the right price, but... I won't bore you with the details. Get to work, killer.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_mail: I was able to decrypt part of that encrypted data you found on Gluhar. It mentions a former USEC operator working under TerraGroup who's looking for a reliable pair of hands. Considering you're confident, you should take a look at it- apparently, his hideout isn't far from the entrance of some hidden-away laboratory. He might have some valuable equipment lying around.
mail.firstQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Alright, listen up, killer. Gluhar and his lackeys are well-armed and well-prepared- and they're expecting trouble. They're over in the old Federal State Reserve Agency base, and tend to patrol around the barracks. You need to put them down and find an encrypted drive on one of them. Kill them, and bring me that damn encrypted drive!
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you'd get out of there unscathed? Well, you can dream, but... it seems like he wants to send you to the grave with this one. Don't believe that it's without risk- everything you do, touch, or breathe on this job will have an impact on your body. Take care, and above all else, take... adequate precautions.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! I didn't believe for a second that you'd make it there, let alone make it back. You wore the mask from start to finish, didn't you? Hand it over, so I can get it properly contained and start taking a look at it- and come see me, when you have time. I've still got work for you.
mail.fourthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Perfect, you're back! See, those eggheads down in TerraGroup's laboratories were working on some sort of new material. Their database is too large and too well-protected for me to learn anything about it in the short term, so... you've got some leg-work to do. Find yourself a gas mask, and get moving. Don't take the mask off until the stuff's left your hands.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_description: Expect the unexpected. It's time to take one small leap into the secrets of TerraGroup- there's still a lot to discover, at all. Don't hesitate, and prepare yourself to undergo significant pressure, exertion and stress. Your life and livelihood is at stake.
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_mail: Ready, dodger? Perfect, because that's the end of your fun. I've prepared something for you- try to make good use of it?
mail.ninthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey, dodger. Finished something for you- go ahead and take it. I don't have a job for you yet, so take advantage of your new-found freetime and prepare yourself. I've made some interesting discoveries, so come back soon and I might be able to tell you what to do.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_description: Despite how hard it was to decrypt the data, Fence's contacts made short work of it. Thanks to them, you've gotten into contact with that ex-USEC operator- but, now he wants you to prove your worth to him. You're going to need to get your hands dirty.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_mail: There you are again! I'm surprised you pulled that off- at least you don't seem like you'll get yourself killed by a bunch of flies. I still need you, so hold on a second: this is important. I have a few more... missions, if you'll take them: and don't worry, I have a good reward in mind.
mail.secondQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, dodger, it was you who managed to decrypt my drive? Interesting! You look like too much of a bruiser to have pulled that off without some help- so, you're going to show me that you've got some wits. You know what's hidden away not too far from here- so, you're going to go in there, and fight your way out. Three times. Get the lead out, we don't have all day!
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_description: Now that you've got your hands on your new rifle, you need to find a way to obtain its ammunition. If it was tested in-house by TerraGroup, then maybe there's some in the Laboratory? The Specialist seems to believe it.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_mail: Whoa! You really found them? Well played! Knew I could count on you- so, listen: I'm going to give you a few for the moment, but not much. Come back later, and I should be able to make more.
mail.seventhQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Listen, if you want me to make rounds for your new toy, you're going to have to do some legwork. Go down into the Laboratory and find the rounds they were using with the prototype rifle. I don't know where they were stored, so I can't really tell you much more- but try to be logical in your searching, alright?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_description: Finally, things are getting serious. The Specialist is putting the finishing touches on a prototype AR-pattern rifle that was meant to be manufactured by TerraGroup and tested in this self-same Laboratory, but... you still lack the most important part: ammunition. Try not to misplace the rifle, would you?
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_mail: And... here! The job's done. I've reassembled the prototype- an M4A1 converted to 6.5x39mm Grendel in-house, but... we don't have the ammunition. Try not to lose it! I don't have what it takes to assemble another right now.
mail.sixthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Pass the rifle over, and I can sort out the conversion.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_description: You thought you were quiet the last time you prevented the TerraGroup raid on the Lab. Turns out, you’re wrong. This is only the beginning of a bitter struggle to keep you from getting your hands on confidential Lab intel, and you angered them.
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_failed: Great, they managed to seize some of the equipment and you didn’t stop them. We just lost some valuable information and assets from TerraGroup that we could have utilized. You’re a damn bother to me!
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_mail: Well done boy, you’ve done a good job again. Here, I managed to get my hands on some prototype armor the scientists were working on while I was still employed under TerraGroup. Take good care of it, it’s the only one I have in stock...
mail.tenthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Hey boy! Listen here, we have a problem on our hands. I just saw a large group of mercenaries enter the Lab. I think they’re back once again to either destroy TerraGroup property or take it for themselves to prevent us from getting our hands on it. Appropriate. Here, take this gear and go defend the Lab. Kill all the mercenaries there before they can leave with any goods, and hurry the hell up! Ah, wait a minute… there’s word that they’re also planning to test some sort of dangerous new gas, so better you be wearing a gas mask as a precaution, lest you end up dead from the gas.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_description: You've proven your worth to him, but this is only the beginning. It's time to give it your all- did you really think that TerraGroups abandoned their lab outright? Well... you're wrong.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_mail: Congratulations! Those jammers were doing some nasty work, but thanks to your efforts, I've got the wiggle-room I needed to get into and around TerraGroup's systems. Together, we can make a hell of a profit- and I'll be able to prepare for you some stuff that was intended for some of their Special Forces contractors. They should allow you to get a leg up on others looking to unearth the secrets of TerraGroup.
mail.thirdQuest_tgs_StartedMail: So, buddy, you're back- ready for a mission? Perfect. It turns out that I could get external access to TerraGroup's servers, but those spooks managed to lock them down tight with jammers. You're going to go in there and get rid of them- so bring a good kit with you and pack a lunch: you're gonna' need it. I should be able to use those jammers for other things, if you bring them back, to get started.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_description: It's time to put your talents to the test. Will you be able to repel them and survive? Or will you succumb and suffer the consequences?
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_mail: Good, you made it through. Nice gun you picked up, they're well-equipped.
mail.twelfthQuest_tgs_StartedMail: Now listen to me. Mercenaries have been shot by scavs in the woods. There must be equipment left where they died, find them and retrieve that equipment. Be careful, Terragroup soldiers are most likely looking for them, so be careful, they're not kidding. Don't hesitate to use the weapon you might find!

tgs_338_badnews.Name: "Bad News" .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_badnews.Description: The “Bad News” in .338 Lapua has become a signature rifle for Noreen Firearms. The rifle was originally designed with the intent of taking a well-known large caliber, and being able to send it downrange accurately, further than any other semi-automatic rifle on the market. Now, with the Bad News Gen. II, we’ve taken a rifle that was already a long-distance powerhouse, and completely upgraded it. With new upgraded receivers, a new gas block, and a mean looking hand-guard, the new Bad News takes everything you loved from the first gen, and made it even better. We took a “signature rifle”, and turned it into a masterpiece.

tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Name: "Bad News" Receiver
tgs_338_badnews_receiver.Description: A receiver specially made for "Bad News" rifle in .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Name: .338 Lapua Magnum Cartridge
tgs_338_lapuamagnum.Description: The .338 Lapua Magnum (8.6×70mm or 8.58×70mm) is a rimless, bottlenecked, centerfire rifle cartridge. It was developed during the 1980s as a high-powered, long-range cartridge for military snipers. It was used in the War in Afghanistan and the Iraq War. As a result of this, it became more widely available. In addition to its military role, it is increasingly used by hunters and civilian long-range shooting enthusiasts. The .338 Lapua Magnum is capable of taking down any game animal, though its suitability for some dangerous game (Cape buffalo, hippopotamus, white rhinoceros, and elephant) is arguable, unless accompanied by a larger "backup" calibre: "There is a huge difference between calibres that will kill an elephant and those that can be relied upon to stop one."

tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Name: 10 Rounds mag .338 Lapua Magnum
tgs_338_LM_20rnd_mag.Description: A 10round magazine specially made for the rifle "Bad News" with .338 Lapua Magnum cartridge.

tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Name: 6,5x39mm GRENDEL bullet prototype
tgs_65x39mm_grendel_prototype.Description: This is a bullet prototype of 6.5x39mm GRENDEL ammo. They are made by the terragroup laboratory.

tgs_armor_prototype.Name: A prototype of a plate carrier vest LBT 6094A
tgs_armor_prototype.Description: A simple and minimalist vest plate holder that can be equipped with a vest. This prototype was designed in the terragroup laboratories and given as equipment to the terragroup special forces.

tgs_beacon.Name: MS2000 Marker
tgs_beacon.Description: The marker is used during nighttime operations. It emits signal in the IR region which are visible through NVGs. Uses special filter when operating in the IR mode, if the filter is removed, it appears as a bright flash in the visible spectrum. In the extended mode operates with a blue flash.

tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Name: Blaze Dogtags
tgs_Blaze_Dogtags.Description: This is the dogtag of the soldier Blaze, who is working for Terragroup Labs. This is a high valuable item that can be used as a proof that you killed the soldier. Blaze was well known in the mercenaries as very experienced and smart. Maybe not smart enough for you.
